00195       {
00196             for (int j=0; j<8; j++)

00275 #define DECAY_OPPLIST_VALUE( value )\
00276 {\
00277       if ( (value) >= SEEN_THIS_TURN)\
00278       {\
00279             (value)++;\
00280             if ( (value) > OLDEST_SEEN_VALUE )\
00281             {\
00282                   (value) = NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN;\
00283             }\
00284       }\
00285       else\
00286       {\
00287             if ( (value) <= HEARD_THIS_TURN)\
00288             {\
00289                   (value)--;\
00290                   if ( (value) < OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE)\
00291                   {\
00292                         (value) = NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN;\
00293                   }\
00294             }\
00295       }\
00296 }

00307 INT16 AdjustMaxSightRangeForEnvEffects( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bLightLevel, INT16 sDistVisible )
00308 {
00309       INT16 sNewDist = 0;
00310 
00311       sNewDist = sDistVisible * gbLightSighting[ 0 ][ bLightLevel ] / 100;
00312 
00313       // Adjust it based on weather...
00314       if ( guiEnvWeather & ( WEATHER_FORECAST_SHOWERS | WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS ) )
00315       {
00316             //sNewDist = sNewDist * 70 / 100;
00317             //rain
00318             sNewDist = sNewDist * ( 100 - min( gGameExternalOptions.ubVisDistDecreasePerRainIntensity * gbCurrentRainIntensity, 100) ) / 100;
00319             //end rain
00320       }
00321       
00322       //rain
00323       if( gfLightningInProgress )
00324             sNewDist += sNewDist * ( ubRealAmbientLightLevel ) / 10;    // 10% per dark level
00325       //end rain
00326 
00327       return( sNewDist );
00328 }

00330 void SwapBestSightingPositions( INT8 bPos1, INT8 bPos2 )
00331 {
00332       UINT8       ubTemp;
00333 
00334       ubTemp = gubBestToMakeSighting[ bPos1 ];
00335       gubBestToMakeSighting[ bPos1 ] = gubBestToMakeSighting[ bPos2 ];
00336       gubBestToMakeSighting[ bPos2 ] = ubTemp;
00337 }
00338 
00339 void ReevaluateBestSightingPosition( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bInterruptDuelPts )
00340 {
00341       UINT8             ubLoop, ubLoop2;
00342       BOOLEAN           fFound = FALSE;
00343       BOOLEAN           fPointsGotLower = FALSE;
00344 
00345       if ( bInterruptDuelPts == NO_INTERRUPT )
00346       {
00347             return;
00348       }
00349 
00350       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER ) )
00351       {
00352             //gfHumanSawSomeoneInRealtime = TRUE;
00353       }
00354 
00355       if ( (pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts != NO_INTERRUPT) && (bInterruptDuelPts < pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts) )
00356       {
00357             fPointsGotLower = TRUE;
00358       }
00359 
00360       if ( fPointsGotLower )
00361       {
00362             // loop to end of array less 1 entry since we can't swap the last entry out of the array
00363             for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < gubBestToMakeSightingSize - 1; ubLoop++ )
00364             {
00365                   if ( pSoldier->ubID == gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] )
00366                   {
00367                         fFound = TRUE;
00368                         break;
00369                   }
00370             }
00371 
00372             // this guy has fewer interrupt pts vs another enemy!  reduce position unless in last place
00373             if (fFound)
00374             {
00375                   // set new points
00376                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "RBSP: reducing points for %d to %d", pSoldier->ubID, bInterruptDuelPts ) );
00377                   pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts = bInterruptDuelPts;
00378 
00379                   // must percolate him down 
00380                   for ( ubLoop2 = ubLoop + 1; ubLoop2 < gubBestToMakeSightingSize; ubLoop2++ )
00381                   {
00382                         if ( gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop2 ] != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop2 - 1 ] ]->bInterruptDuelPts < MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop2 ] ]->bInterruptDuelPts )
00383                         {
00384                               SwapBestSightingPositions( (UINT8) (ubLoop2 - 1), ubLoop2 );
00385                         }
00386                         else
00387                         {
00388                               break;
00389                         }
00390                   }
00391             }
00392             else if ( pSoldier->ubID == gubBestToMakeSighting[ gubBestToMakeSightingSize - 1] )
00393             {
00394                   // in list but can't be bumped down... set his new points
00395                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "RBSP: reduced points for last individual %d to %d", pSoldier->ubID, bInterruptDuelPts ) );
00396                   pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts = bInterruptDuelPts;
00397             }
00398       }
00399       else
00400       {
00401             // loop through whole array
00402             for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < gubBestToMakeSightingSize; ubLoop++ )
00403             {
00404                   if ( pSoldier->ubID == gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] )
00405                   {
00406                         fFound = TRUE;
00407                         break;
00408                   }
00409             }
00410 
00411             if (!fFound)
00412             {
00413                   for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < gubBestToMakeSightingSize; ubLoop++ )
00414                   {
00415                         if ( (gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] == NOBODY) || (bInterruptDuelPts > MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] ]->bInterruptDuelPts ) )
00416                         {
00417                               if ( gubBestToMakeSighting[ gubBestToMakeSightingSize - 1 ] != NOBODY )
00418                               {
00419                                     MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ gubBestToMakeSightingSize - 1 ] ]->bInterruptDuelPts = NO_INTERRUPT;
00420                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "RBSP: resetting points for %d to zilch", pSoldier->ubID ) );
00421                               }
00422 
00423                               // set new points
00424                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "RBSP: setting points for %d to %d", pSoldier->ubID, bInterruptDuelPts ) );
00425                               pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts = bInterruptDuelPts;
00426 
00427                               // insert here!
00428                               for ( ubLoop2 = gubBestToMakeSightingSize - 1; ubLoop2 > ubLoop; ubLoop2-- )
00429                               {
00430                                     gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop2 ] = gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop2 - 1 ];
00431                               }
00432                               gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] = pSoldier->ubID; 
00433                               break;
00434                         }
00435                   }           
00436             }
00437             // else points didn't get lower, so do nothing (because we want to leave each merc with as low int points as possible)
00438       }
00439 
00440       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE; ubLoop++ )
00441       {
00442             if ( (gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] != NOBODY) )
00443             {
00444                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "RBSP entry %d: %d (%d pts)", ubLoop, gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ], MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] ]->bInterruptDuelPts ) );
00445             }
00446       }
00447 
00448 }
00449 
00450 void HandleBestSightingPositionInRealtime( void )
00451 {
00452       // This function is called for handling interrupts when opening a door in non-combat or
00453       // just sighting in non-combat, deciding who gets the first turn
00454 
00455       UINT8       ubLoop;
00456 
00457       if ( gfDelayResolvingBestSightingDueToDoor )
00458       {
00459             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "HBSPIR: skipping due to door flag" );
00460             return;
00461       }
00462 
00463       if (gubBestToMakeSighting[ 0 ] != NOBODY)
00464       {
00465             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "HBSPIR called and there is someone in the list" );
00466 
00467             //if (gfHumanSawSomeoneInRealtime)
00468             {
00469                   if (gubBestToMakeSighting[ 1 ] == NOBODY)
00470                   {
00471                         // award turn
00472                         EnterCombatMode( MercPtrs[gubBestToMakeSighting[ 0 ]]->bTeam );
00473                   }
00474                   else
00475                   {
00476                         // if 1st and 2nd on same team, or 1st and 3rd on same team, or there IS no 3rd, award turn to 1st
00477                         if (  ( MercPtrs[gubBestToMakeSighting[ 0 ]]->bTeam == MercPtrs[gubBestToMakeSighting[ 1 ]]->bTeam ) ||
00478                                           ( (gubBestToMakeSighting[ 2 ] == NOBODY) || ( MercPtrs[gubBestToMakeSighting[ 0 ]]->bTeam == MercPtrs[gubBestToMakeSighting[ 2 ]]->bTeam ) )
00479                                )
00480                         {
00481                               EnterCombatMode( MercPtrs[gubBestToMakeSighting[ 0 ]]->bTeam );
00482                         }
00483                         else // give turn to 2nd best but interrupt to 1st
00484                         {
00485                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Entering combat mode: turn for 2nd best, int for best" );
00486 
00487                               EnterCombatMode( MercPtrs[gubBestToMakeSighting[ 1 ]]->bTeam );
00488                               // 2nd guy loses control
00489                               AddToIntList( gubBestToMakeSighting[ 1 ], FALSE, TRUE);
00490                               // 1st guy gains control
00491                               AddToIntList( gubBestToMakeSighting[ 0 ], TRUE, TRUE);
00492                               // done
00493                               DoneAddingToIntList( MercPtrs[gubBestToMakeSighting[ 0 ]], TRUE, SIGHTINTERRUPT );
00494                         }
00495                   }
00496             }
00497       
00498             for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE; ubLoop++ )
00499             {
00500                   if ( gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] != NOBODY )
00501                   {
00502                         MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ]]->bInterruptDuelPts = NO_INTERRUPT;
00503                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "RBSP: done, resetting points for %d to zilch", MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] ]->ubID ) );
00504                   }
00505             }     
00506 
00507             for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < guiNumMercSlots; ubLoop++ )
00508             {
00509                   if ( MercSlots[ ubLoop ] )                
00510                   {
00511                         AssertMsg( MercSlots[ ubLoop ]->bInterruptDuelPts == NO_INTERRUPT, String( "%S (%d) still has interrupt pts!", MercSlots[ ubLoop ]->name, MercSlots[ ubLoop ]->ubID ) );
00512                   }
00513             }     
00514       }
00515 
00516       
00517 }
00518 
00519 void HandleBestSightingPositionInTurnbased( void )
00520 {
00521       // This function is called for handling interrupts when opening a door in turnbased
00522 
00523       UINT8       ubLoop, ubLoop2;
00524       BOOLEAN     fOk = FALSE;
00525 
00526       if ( gubBestToMakeSighting[ 0 ] != NOBODY )
00527       {
00528             if ( MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ 0 ] ]->bTeam != gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam )
00529             {
00530                   
00531                   // interrupt!
00532                   for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < gubBestToMakeSightingSize; ubLoop++ )
00533                   {
00534                         if ( gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] == NOBODY )
00535                         {
00536                               if (gubInterruptProvoker == NOBODY)
00537                               {
00538                                     // do nothing (for now) - abort!
00539                                     return;
00540                               }
00541                               else
00542                               {
00543                                     // use this guy as the "interrupted" fellow
00544                                     gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] = gubInterruptProvoker;
00545                                     fOk = TRUE;
00546                                     break;
00547                               }
00548                               
00549                         }
00550                         else if ( MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] ]->bTeam == gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam )
00551                         {
00552                               fOk = TRUE;
00553                               break;
00554                         }
00555                   }
00556 
00557                   if ( fOk )
00558                   {
00559                         // this is the guy who gets "interrupted"; all else before him interrupted him
00560                         AddToIntList( gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ], FALSE, TRUE);
00561                         for ( ubLoop2 = 0; ubLoop2 < ubLoop; ubLoop2++ )
00562                         {
00563                               AddToIntList( gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop2 ], TRUE, TRUE);
00564                         }
00565                         // done
00566                         DoneAddingToIntList( MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] ], TRUE, SIGHTINTERRUPT );
00567                   }
00568 
00569             }
00570             for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE; ubLoop++ )
00571             {
00572                   if ( gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] != NOBODY )
00573                   {
00574                         MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ]]->bInterruptDuelPts = NO_INTERRUPT;
00575                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "RBSP (TB): done, resetting points for %d to zilch", MercPtrs[ gubBestToMakeSighting[ ubLoop ] ]->ubID ) );
00576                   }
00577             }
00578 
00579             for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < guiNumMercSlots; ubLoop++ )
00580             {
00581                   if ( MercSlots[ ubLoop ] )                
00582                   {
00583                         AssertMsg( MercSlots[ ubLoop ]->bInterruptDuelPts == NO_INTERRUPT, String( "%S (%d) still has interrupt pts!", MercSlots[ ubLoop ]->name, MercSlots[ ubLoop ]->ubID ) );
00584                   }
00585             }     
00586 
00587 
00588       }
00589 
00590 }

00603 void AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( UINT8 ubID )
00604 {
00605       UINT8       ubLoop;
00606 
00607       Assert( gubNumShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote < SHOULD_BECOME_HOSTILE_SIZE );
00608 
00609       if ( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bLife < OKLIFE ) 
00610       {
00611             return;
00612       }
00613 
00614       // make sure not already in list
00615       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < gubNumShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote; ubLoop++ )
00616       {
00617             if ( gubShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote[ ubLoop ] == ubID )
00618             {
00619                   return;
00620             }
00621       }
00622 
00623       gubShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote[ gubNumShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote ] = ubID;
00624       gubNumShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote++;
00625 }
00626 
00627 UINT8 SelectSpeakerFromHostileOrSayQuoteList( void )
00628 {
00629       UINT8                               ubProfileList[ SHOULD_BECOME_HOSTILE_SIZE ]; // NB list of merc IDs, not profiles!
00630       UINT8                               ubLoop, ubNumProfiles = 0;
00631       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
00632 
00633       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < gubNumShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote; ubLoop++ )
00634       {
00635             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gubShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote[ ubLoop ] ];
00636             if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
00637             {
00638                   
00639                   // make sure person can say quote!!!!
00640                   gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags2 |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_NEEDS_TO_SAY_HOSTILE_QUOTE;
00641 
00642                   if ( NPCHasUnusedHostileRecord( pSoldier->ubProfile, APPROACH_DECLARATION_OF_HOSTILITY ) )
00643                   {
00644                         ubProfileList[ ubNumProfiles ] = gubShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote[ ubLoop ];
00645                         ubNumProfiles++;
00646                   }
00647                   else
00648                   {
00649                         // turn flag off again
00650                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags2 &= ~PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_NEEDS_TO_SAY_HOSTILE_QUOTE;
00651                   }
00652 
00653             }
00654       }
00655 
00656       if ( ubNumProfiles == 0 )
00657       {
00658             return( NOBODY );
00659       }
00660       else
00661       {
00662             return( ubProfileList[ Random( ubNumProfiles ) ] );
00663       }
00664 }

00666 extern BOOLEAN gfWaitingForTriggerTimer;
00667 
00668 void CheckHostileOrSayQuoteList( void )
00669 {
00670       if ( gubNumShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote == 0 || !DialogueQueueIsEmpty() || gfInTalkPanel || gfWaitingForTriggerTimer )
00671       {
00672             return;
00673       }
00674       else
00675       {
00676             UINT8 ubSpeaker, ubLoop;
00677             SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00678 
00679             ubSpeaker = SelectSpeakerFromHostileOrSayQuoteList();
00680             if ( ubSpeaker == NOBODY )
00681             {
00682                   // make sure everyone on this list is hostile
00683                   for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < gubNumShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote; ubLoop++ )
00684                   {
00685                         pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gubShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote[ ubLoop ] ];
00686                         if ( pSoldier->bNeutral )
00687                         {
00688                               MakeCivHostile( pSoldier, 2 );
00689                               // make civ group, if any, hostile
00690                               if ( pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM && pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup != NON_CIV_GROUP && gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup ] == CIV_GROUP_WILL_BECOME_HOSTILE )
00691                               {
00692                                     gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup ] = CIV_GROUP_HOSTILE;
00693                               }
00694                         }
00695                   }
00696 
00697                   // unpause all AI
00698                   UnPauseAI();
00699                   // reset the list 
00700                   memset( &gubShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote, NOBODY, SHOULD_BECOME_HOSTILE_SIZE );
00701                   gubNumShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote = 0;
00702                   //and return/go into combat
00703                   if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00704                   {
00705                         EnterCombatMode( CIV_TEAM );
00706                   }
00707             }
00708             else
00709             {
00710                   // pause all AI
00711                   PauseAIUntilManuallyUnpaused();
00712                   // stop everyone?
00713 
00714                   // We want to make this guy visible to the player.
00715                   if ( MercPtrs[ ubSpeaker ]->bVisible != TRUE )
00716                   {                       
00717                         gbPublicOpplist[ gbPlayerNum ][ ubSpeaker ] = HEARD_THIS_TURN;
00718                         HandleSight( MercPtrs[ ubSpeaker ], SIGHT_LOOK | SIGHT_RADIO );
00719                   }
00720                   // trigger hater
00721                   TriggerNPCWithIHateYouQuote( MercPtrs[ ubSpeaker ]->ubProfile );
00722             }
00723       }
00724 }
00725 
00726 void HandleSight(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubSightFlags)
00727 {
00728  UINT32 uiLoop;
00729  SOLDIERTYPE *pThem;
00730  INT8             bTempNewSituation;
00731 
00732  if (!pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector || pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD )
00733  {
00734       // I DON'T THINK SO!
00735       return;
00736  }
00737 
00738  gubSightFlags = ubSightFlags;
00739 
00740       if ( gubBestToMakeSightingSize != BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_ALL_TEAMS_LOOK_FOR_ALL )
00741       {
00742             // if this is not being called as a result of all teams look for all, reset array size
00743             if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
00744             {
00745                   // NB the incombat size is 0
00746                   gubBestToMakeSightingSize = BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_INCOMBAT;
00747             }
00748             else
00749             {
00750                   gubBestToMakeSightingSize = BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_NONCOMBAT;
00751             }
00752 
00753             InitSightArrays();
00754       }
00755 
00756       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUM_WATCHED_LOCS; uiLoop++ )
00757       {
00758             gfWatchedLocHasBeenIncremented[ pSoldier->ubID ][ uiLoop ] = FALSE;
00759       }
00760 
00761       gfPlayerTeamSawCreatures = FALSE;
00762 
00763       // store new situation value
00764       bTempNewSituation = pSoldier->bNewSituation;
00765       pSoldier->bNewSituation = FALSE;
00766 
00767       // if we've been told to make this soldier look (& others look back at him)
00768       if (ubSightFlags & SIGHT_LOOK)
00769       {
00770 
00771             // if this soldier's under our control and well enough to look
00772             if (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00773             {
00774              /*
00775 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
00776      fprintf(OpplistFile,"ManLooksForOtherTeams (HandleSight/Look) for %d\n",pSoldier->guynum);
00777 #endif
00778             */
00779                   // he looks for all other soldiers not on his own team
00780                   ManLooksForOtherTeams(pSoldier);
00781 
00782      // if "Show only enemies seen" option is ON and it's this guy looking
00783      //if (pSoldier->ubID == ShowOnlySeenPerson)
00784        //NewShowOnlySeenPerson(pSoldier);                  // update the string
00785             }
00786 
00787 
00788        /*
00789 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
00790    fprintf(OpplistFile,"OtherTeamsLookForMan (HandleSight/Look) for %d\n",ptr->guynum);
00791 #endif
00792        */
00793 
00794             // all soldiers under our control but not on ptr's team look for him
00795             OtherTeamsLookForMan(pSoldier);
00796       } // end of SIGHT_LOOK
00797 
00798       // if we've been told that interrupts are possible as a result of sighting
00799       if ((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && (ubSightFlags & SIGHT_INTERRUPT))
00800       {
00801             ResolveInterruptsVs( pSoldier, SIGHTINTERRUPT );
00802   }
00803 
00804       if ( gubBestToMakeSightingSize == BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_NONCOMBAT )
00805       {
00806             HandleBestSightingPositionInRealtime();
00807       }
00808 
00809       if ( pSoldier->bNewSituation && !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC) )
00810       {
00811             HaultSoldierFromSighting( pSoldier, TRUE );
00812       }
00813       pSoldier->bNewSituation = __max( pSoldier->bNewSituation, bTempNewSituation );
00814             
00815       // if we've been told to radio the results
00816       if (ubSightFlags & SIGHT_RADIO)
00817       {
00818             if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC )
00819             {
00820                   // update our team's public knowledge
00821                   RadioSightings(pSoldier,EVERYBODY, pSoldier->bTeam );
00822 
00823 #ifdef WE_SEE_WHAT_MILITIA_SEES_AND_VICE_VERSA
00824                   RadioSightings(pSoldier,EVERYBODY, MILITIA_TEAM);
00825 #endif
00826 
00827                   // if it's our local player's merc
00828                   if (PTR_OURTEAM)
00829                         // revealing roofs and looking for items handled here, too
00830                         RevealRoofsAndItems(pSoldier,TRUE, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel, FALSE );
00831             }
00832             // unless in easy mode allow alerted enemies to radio
00833             else if ( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel >= DIF_LEVEL_MEDIUM )
00834             {
00835                   // don't allow admins to radio
00836                   //Madd: Huh?  why not admins?  removed.
00837                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM && gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition ) //&& pSoldier->ubSoldierClass !=      SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR )
00838                   {
00839                         RadioSightings(pSoldier,EVERYBODY, pSoldier->bTeam );
00840                   }
00841             }
00842 
00843             pSoldier->bNewOppCnt = 0;
00844             pSoldier->bNeedToLook = FALSE;
00845 
00846 
00847 // Temporary for opplist synching - disable random order radioing
00848 #ifndef RECORDOPPLIST
00849             // if this soldier's NOT on our team (MAY be under our control, though!)
00850             if (!PTR_OURTEAM)
00851                   OurTeamRadiosRandomlyAbout(pSoldier->ubID);     // radio about him only
00852 #endif
00853 
00854 
00855             // all non-humans under our control would now radio, if they were allowed
00856             // to radio automatically (but they're not).  So just nuke new opp cnt
00857             // NEW: under LOCALOPPLIST, humans on other teams now also radio in here
00858             for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
00859             {
00860                   pThem = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
00861 
00862                   if (pThem != NULL && pThem->bLife >= OKLIFE)
00863                   {
00864                         // if this merc is on the same team as the target soldier
00865                         if (pThem->bTeam == pSoldier->bTeam)
00866                               continue;        // he doesn't look (he ALWAYS knows about him)
00867 
00868                         // other human team's merc report sightings to their teams now
00869                         if (pThem->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
00870                         {
00871 // Temporary for opplist synching - disable random order radioing
00872 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
00873                               // do our own team, too, since we've bypassed random radioing
00874                               if (TRUE)
00875 #else
00876                               // exclude our own team, we've already done them, randomly
00877                               if (pThem->bTeam != gbPlayerNum)
00878 #endif
00879                                     RadioSightings(pThem,pSoldier->ubID, pThem->bTeam);
00880                         }
00881                         // unless in easy mode allow alerted enemies to radio
00882                         else if ( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel >= DIF_LEVEL_MEDIUM )
00883                         {
00884                               // don't allow admins to radio
00885                               if ( pThem->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM && gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition && pThem->ubSoldierClass !=    SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR )
00886                               {
00887                                     RadioSightings(pThem,EVERYBODY, pThem->bTeam );
00888                               }
00889                         }
00890 
00891 
00892                         pThem->bNewOppCnt = 0;
00893                         pThem->bNeedToLook = FALSE;
00894                   }
00895             }
00896       }
00897 
00898       // CJC August 13 2002: at the end of handling sight, reset sight flags to allow interrupts in case an audio cue should
00899       // cause someone to see an enemy
00900       gubSightFlags |= SIGHT_INTERRUPT;
00901 }
00902 
00903 
00904 void OurTeamRadiosRandomlyAbout(UINT8 ubAbout)
00905 {
00906  INT32                        iLoop;
00907  INT8                         radioCnt = 0,radioMan[20];
00908  SOLDIERTYPE      *pSoldier;
00909 
00910 
00911 // Temporary for opplist synching - disable random order radioing
00912 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
00913  for (iLoop = Status.team[Net.pnum].guystart,ourPtr = MercPtrs[iLoop]; iLoop < Status.team[Net.pnum].guyend; iLoop++,ourPtr++)
00914   {
00915    // if this merc is active, in this sector, and well enough to look
00916    if (pSoldier->active && pSoldier->bInSector && (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE))
00917     {
00918      RadioSightings(pSoldier,ubAbout,pSoldier->bTeam);
00919      pSoldier->bNewOppCnt = 0;
00920     }
00921   }
00922 
00923  return;
00924 #endif
00925 
00926 
00927  // All mercs on our local team check if they should radio about him
00928  iLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bFirstID;
00929 
00930  // make a list of all of our team's mercs
00931  for (pSoldier = MercPtrs[iLoop]; iLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bLastID; iLoop++,pSoldier++)
00932   {
00933    // if this merc is active, in this sector, and well enough to look
00934    if (pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE))
00935      // put him on our list, and increment the counter
00936      radioMan[radioCnt++] = (INT8)iLoop;
00937   }
00938 
00939 
00940  // now RANDOMLY handle each of the mercs on our list, until none remain
00941  // (this is all being done ONLY so that the mercs in the earliest merc
00942  //  slots do not arbitrarily get the bulk of the sighting speech quote
00943  //  action, while the later ones almost never pipe up, and is NOT
00944  //  strictly necessary, but a nice improvement over original JA)
00945  while (radioCnt)
00946   {
00947    // pick a merc from one of the remaining slots at random
00948    iLoop = Random(radioCnt);
00949 
00950    // handle radioing for that merc
00951    RadioSightings(MercPtrs[radioMan[iLoop]],ubAbout,MercPtrs[radioMan[iLoop]]->bTeam);
00952    Menptr[radioMan[iLoop]].bNewOppCnt = 0;
00953 
00954    // unless it WAS the last used slot that we happened to pick
00955    if (iLoop != (radioCnt - 1))
00956      // move the contents of the last slot into the one just handled
00957      radioMan[iLoop] = radioMan[radioCnt - 1];
00958 
00959    radioCnt--;
00960   }
00961 }

00971 
00972 INT16 TeamNoLongerSeesMan( UINT8 ubTeam, SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent, UINT8 ubExcludeID, INT8 bIteration )
00973 {
00974  UINT16 bLoop;
00975  SOLDIERTYPE *pMate;
00976 
00977 
00978  bLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ubTeam].bFirstID;
00979 
00980  // look for all mercs on the same team, check opplists for this soldier
00981  for (pMate = MercPtrs[bLoop]; bLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ubTeam].bLastID; bLoop++,pMate++)
00982   {
00983    // if this "teammate" is me, myself, or I (whom we want to exclude)
00984    if (bLoop == ubExcludeID)
00985      continue;          // skip to next teammate, I KNOW I don't see him...
00986 
00987    // if this merc is not on the same team
00988    if (pMate->bTeam != ubTeam)
00989      continue;  // skip him, he's no teammate at all!
00990 
00991    // if this merc is not active, at base, on assignment, dead, unconscious
00992    if (!pMate->bActive || !pMate->bInSector || (pMate->bLife < OKLIFE))
00993      continue;  // next merc
00994 
00995    // if this teammate currently sees this opponent
00996    if (pMate->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
00997      return(FALSE);     // that's all I need to know, get out of here
00998   }
00999 
01000 #ifdef WE_SEE_WHAT_MILITIA_SEES_AND_VICE_VERSA
01001       if ( bIteration == 0 )
01002       {
01003             if ( ubTeam == gbPlayerNum && gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bTeamActive )
01004             {
01005                   // check militia team as well
01006                   return( TeamNoLongerSeesMan( MILITIA_TEAM, pOpponent, ubExcludeID, 1 ) );
01007             }
01008             else if ( ubTeam == MILITIA_TEAM && gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bTeamActive )
01009             {
01010                   // check player team as well
01011                   return( TeamNoLongerSeesMan( gbPlayerNum, pOpponent, ubExcludeID, 1 ) );
01012             }
01013       }
01014 #endif
01015 
01016  // none of my friends is currently seeing the guy, so return success
01017  return(TRUE);
01018 }
01019 
01020 INT16 DistanceSmellable( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pSubject )
01021 {
01022       INT16 sDistVisible = STRAIGHT; // as a base
01023 
01024       //if (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED)
01025       //{
01026             sDistVisible *= 2;
01027       //}
01028       //else
01029       //{
01030 
01031       //    sDistVisible += 3;
01032       //}
01033 
01034       if (pSubject)
01035       {
01036             if (pSubject->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
01037             {
01038                   // trying to smell a friend; change nothing
01039             }
01040             else
01041             {
01042                   // smelling a human or animal; if they are coated with monster smell, distance shrinks
01043                   sDistVisible = sDistVisible * (pSubject->bNormalSmell - pSubject->bMonsterSmell) / NORMAL_HUMAN_SMELL_STRENGTH;
01044                   if (sDistVisible < 0)
01045                   {
01046                         sDistVisible = 0;
01047                   }
01048             }
01049       }
01050       return( sDistVisible );
01051 }
01052 
01053 INT16 MaxDistanceVisible( void )
01054 {
01055       return( STRAIGHT * 2 );
01056 }
01057 
01058 INT16 DistanceVisible( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bFacingDir, INT8 bSubjectDir, INT16 sSubjectGridNo, INT8 bLevel, SOLDIERTYPE *pOther )
01059 {
01060       INT16 sDistVisible;
01061       INT8  bLightLevel;
01062       SOLDIERTYPE * pSubject;
01063       BOOLEAN sideViewLimit = FALSE;
01064 
01065       pSubject = SimpleFindSoldier( sSubjectGridNo, bLevel );
01066 
01067       if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
01068       {
01069             if ( !pSubject ) 
01070             {
01071                   return( FALSE );
01072             }
01073             return( DistanceSmellable( pSoldier, pSubject ) );
01074       }
01075 
01076       if (pSoldier->bBlindedCounter > 0)
01077       {
01078             // we're bliiiiiiiiind!!!
01079             return( 0 );
01080       }
01081 
01082       if ( bFacingDir == DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT && TANK( pSoldier ) )
01083       {
01084             // always calculate direction for tanks so we have something to work with
01085             bFacingDir = pSoldier->bDesiredDirection;
01086             bSubjectDir = (INT8) GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, sSubjectGridNo );
01087             //bSubjectDir = atan8(pSoldier->sX,pSoldier->sY,pOpponent->sX,pOpponent->sY);
01088       }
01089 
01090       if ( !TANK( pSoldier ) && ( bFacingDir == DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT || (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT) || (pSubject && pSubject->fMuzzleFlash) ) )
01091       {
01092             sDistVisible = MaxDistanceVisible();
01093       }
01094       else
01095       {
01096 
01097             if (pSoldier->sGridNo == sSubjectGridNo)
01098             {
01099                   // looking up or down or two people accidentally in same tile... don't want it to be 0!
01100                   sDistVisible = MaxDistanceVisible();
01101             }
01102             else
01103             {
01104             // Lesh: added this
01105                   if( SoldierHasLimitedVision(pSoldier) )
01106                   {
01107                         bSubjectDir = (INT8) GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, sSubjectGridNo );
01108                   }
01109 
01110                   sDistVisible = gbLookDistance[bFacingDir][bSubjectDir];
01111 
01112             // Lesh: and this
01113             if ( (sDistVisible == 0) && (SoldierHasLimitedVision(pSoldier)) )
01114                 return(0);
01115 
01116                   if ( sDistVisible != STRAIGHT )
01117                   {
01118                         INT16 tunnelVisionInPercent = GetPercentTunnelVision(pSoldier);
01119                         
01120                         if ( tunnelVisionInPercent > 0) 
01121                         {
01122                               sideViewLimit = TRUE;
01123                               sDistVisible = sDistVisible * (100 - tunnelVisionInPercent ) / 100 ;
01124                         }
01125                   }
01126 
01127 //                ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"sDistVisible: %d", GetPercentTunnelVision(pSoldier) );
01128 
01129                   if ( sDistVisible == ANGLE && (pSoldier->bTeam == OUR_TEAM || pSoldier->bAlertStatus >= STATUS_RED ) )
01130                   {
01131                         sDistVisible = STRAIGHT;
01132                   }
01133 
01134                   sDistVisible *= 2;
01135 
01136                   if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == RUNNING )
01137                   {
01138                         if ( gbLookDistance[bFacingDir][bSubjectDir] != STRAIGHT )
01139                         {
01140                               // reduce sight when we're not looking in that direction...
01141                               // (20%?)
01142                               sDistVisible = (sDistVisible * 8) / 10;
01143                         }
01144                   }
01145             }
01146       }
01147 
01148       if (pSoldier->bLevel != bLevel)
01149       {
01150             // add two tiles distance to visibility to/from roofs
01151             // sDistVisible += (STRAIGHT_RATIO * 2); //2;
01152             sDistVisible += ( sDistVisible / 6 ); //lal changed distance to 1/6 from visible range
01153       }
01154 
01155       // now reduce based on light level; SHADE_MIN is the define for the
01156       // highest number the light can be
01157 
01158       // If we're about to ask for a light level for a location outside of our 
01159       // valid map references then use the ambient light level instead.
01160       if(0 > sSubjectGridNo || sSubjectGridNo > WORLD_MAX)
01161       {
01162             if(pSoldier != pOther)
01163             {
01164                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("113/UC Warning! Tried to detect the light level when character %ls[%d] at gridno %d tries to look for character %ls[%d] who outside of the valid map (gridno %d). Assigning default %d", 
01165                         pSoldier->name, pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->sGridNo, pOther->name, pOther->ubID, pOther->sGridNo, ubAmbientLightLevel));  
01166             }
01167             else
01168             {
01169                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("113/UC Warning! Tried to detect the light level when character %ls[%d] looks at a location outside of the valid map (gridno %d). Assigning default %d",
01170                         pSoldier->name, pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->sGridNo, ubAmbientLightLevel));
01171             }
01172       }
01173       else
01174       {
01175             bLightLevel = LightTrueLevel(sSubjectGridNo, bLevel);
01176       }
01177 
01178       // Snap: I think this was intended to give maximum visibility to targets with muzzle flash...
01179       // Corrected accordingly:
01180       //if ( pSubject && !( pSubject->fMuzzleFlash && (bLightLevel > NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY) ) )
01181       if ( !( pSubject && pSubject->fMuzzleFlash && (bLightLevel > NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY) ) )
01182       {
01183             // ATE: Made function to adjust light distence...
01184             sDistVisible = AdjustMaxSightRangeForEnvEffects( pSoldier, bLightLevel, sDistVisible );
01185       }
01186 
01187       // Snap: this takes care of all equipment bonuses at all light levels
01188       // The rest is special code for robots, bloodcats and NO specialists
01189       // Lalien: change to % instead of tiles, add bonus only to front view when using scope
01190       if (!sideViewLimit)
01191       {
01192             sDistVisible += sDistVisible * GetTotalVisionRangeBonus(pSoldier, bLightLevel) / 100;
01193       }
01194 
01195 
01196 
01197       
01198       // give one step better vision for people with nightops
01199       if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, NIGHTOPS ))
01200       {
01201             sDistVisible += NightBonusScale( 1 * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, NIGHTOPS ), bLightLevel);
01202       }
01203       // Bloodcat bonus only works above ground
01204       else if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT && gbWorldSectorZ == 0 )
01205       {
01206             sDistVisible += NightBonusScale( UVGOGGLES_BONUS, bLightLevel);
01207       }
01208       else if (   AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) ) 
01209       {
01210             sDistVisible += NightBonusScale( NIGHTSIGHTGOGGLES_BONUS, bLightLevel);
01211       }
01212 
01213       // let tanks see and be seen further (at night)
01214       if ( (TANK( pSoldier ) && sDistVisible > 0) || (pSubject && TANK( pSubject ) ) )
01215       {
01216             sDistVisible = __max( sDistVisible + 5, MaxDistanceVisible() );
01217       }
01218 
01219       if ( gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[ bLevel ] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS) )
01220       {
01221 //          if ( pSoldier->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem != GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem != GASMASK )
01222             if ( FindGasMask (pSoldier) == NO_SLOT )
01223             {
01224                   // in gas without a gas mask; reduce max distance visible to 2 tiles at most
01225                   sDistVisible = __min( sDistVisible, 2 );
01226             }
01227       }
01228       if ( gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[ bLevel ] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS )
01229       {
01230             {
01231                   // in FLAMETHERgas ; reduce max distance visible to 2 tiles at most
01232                   sDistVisible = __min( sDistVisible, 2 );
01233             }
01234       }
01235 
01236       return(sDistVisible);
01237 }

01240 
01241 void EndMuzzleFlash( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01242 {
01243       UINT32                              uiLoop;
01244       SOLDIERTYPE *           pOtherSoldier;
01245 
01246       pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
01247 
01248 #ifdef WE_SEE_WHAT_MILITIA_SEES_AND_VICE_VERSA
01249       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bTeam != MILITIA_TEAM )
01250 #else
01251       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01252 #endif
01253       {
01254             pSoldier->bVisible = 0; // indeterminate state
01255       }
01256 
01257       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
01258       {
01259             pOtherSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
01260 
01261             if ( pOtherSoldier != NULL )
01262             {
01263                   if ( pOtherSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
01264                   {
01265                         if ( pOtherSoldier->sGridNo != NOWHERE )
01266                         {     
01267                               if ( PythSpacesAway( pOtherSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) > DistanceVisible( pOtherSoldier, (SoldierHasLimitedVision(pSoldier) ? pOtherSoldier->bDesiredDirection : DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT), DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier ) )                             
01268                               {
01269                                     // if this guy can no longer see us, change to seen this turn
01270                                     HandleManNoLongerSeen( pOtherSoldier, pSoldier, &(pOtherSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ]), &(gbPublicOpplist[ pOtherSoldier->bTeam ][ pSoldier->ubID ] ) );
01271                               }
01272 
01273                               // else this person is still seen, if the looker is on our side or the militia the person should stay visible
01274 #ifdef WE_SEE_WHAT_MILITIA_SEES_AND_VICE_VERSA
01275                               else if ( pOtherSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum || pOtherSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
01276 #else
01277                               else if ( pOtherSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
01278 #endif
01279 
01280                               {
01281                                     pSoldier->bVisible = TRUE; // yes, still seen
01282                               }
01283                         }
01284                   }
01285             }
01286       }
01287       DecideTrueVisibility( pSoldier, FALSE );
01288 
01289 }

01322 
01323 INT8 DecideHearing( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01324 {
01325       // calculate the hearing value for the merc...
01326 
01327       INT8        bSlot;
01328       INT8        bHearing;
01329 
01330       if ( TANK( pSoldier ) )
01331       {
01332             return( -5 );
01333       }
01334       else if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER )
01335       {
01336             return( -10 );
01337       }
01338 
01339       bHearing = 0;
01340 
01341       if (pSoldier->bExpLevel > 3)
01342       {
01343             bHearing++;
01344       }
01345 
01346       if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, NIGHTOPS ))
01347       {
01348             // sharper hearing generally
01349             bHearing += 1 * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, NIGHTOPS );
01350       }
01351 
01352       //bSlot = FindObj( pSoldier, EXTENDEDEAR );
01353       //if ( bSlot == HEAD1POS || bSlot == HEAD2POS)
01354       bSlot = FindHearingAid(pSoldier);
01355       if ( bSlot != -1 )
01356       {
01357             // at 81-100% adds +5, at 61-80% adds +4, at 41-60% adds +3, etc.
01358             bHearing += GetHearingRangeBonus(pSoldier);  // pSoldier->inv[bSlot].bStatus[0] / 20 + 1;
01359       }
01360 
01361       // adjust for dark conditions 
01362       switch ( ubAmbientLightLevel )
01363       {
01364             case 8:
01365             case 9:
01366                   bHearing += 1;
01367                   break;
01368             case 10:
01369                   bHearing += 2;
01370                   break;
01371             case 11:    
01372             case 12:
01373             case 13:
01374             case 14:
01375             case 15:
01376                   bHearing += 3;
01377                   if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, NIGHTOPS ))
01378                   {
01379                         // yet another bonus for nighttime
01380                         bHearing += 1 * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, NIGHTOPS );
01381                   }
01382                   break;
01383             default:
01384                   break;
01385       }
01386 
01387       return( bHearing );
01388 }

01393       // the results of hearing the noise are lumped in with the results from AllTeamsLookForAll
01394       gubBestToMakeSightingSize = BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_ALL_TEAMS_LOOK_FOR_ALL;

01396       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "HBSPIR: setting door flag on" );
01397       // must init sight arrays here
01398       InitSightArrays();

01402 void AllTeamsLookForAll(UINT8 ubAllowInterrupts)
01403 {
01404  UINT32 uiLoop;
01405  SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01406 
01407       if( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01408       {
01409             return;
01410       }
01411 
01412       if (ubAllowInterrupts || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
01413       {
01414             gubBestToMakeSightingSize = BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_ALL_TEAMS_LOOK_FOR_ALL;
01415             if ( gfDelayResolvingBestSightingDueToDoor )
01416             {
01417                   // turn off flag now, and skip init of sight arrays
01418                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "HBSPIR: turning door flag off" );
01419                   gfDelayResolvingBestSightingDueToDoor = FALSE;
01420             }
01421             else
01422             {
01423                   InitSightArrays();
01424             }
01425       }
01426 
01427       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
01428       {
01429             pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
01430 
01431             if ( pSoldier != NULL && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
01432             {
01433                   HandleSight(pSoldier,SIGHT_LOOK);  // no radio or interrupts yet
01434             }
01435   }
01436 
01437       // the player team now radios about all sightings
01438       for ( uiLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; uiLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; uiLoop++ )
01439       {
01440             HandleSight( MercPtrs[ uiLoop ], SIGHT_RADIO );      // looking was done above
01441       }
01442 
01443       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
01444       {
01445             // decide who should get first turn
01446             HandleBestSightingPositionInRealtime();
01447             // this could have made us switch to combat mode
01448             if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
01449             {
01450                   gubBestToMakeSightingSize = BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_INCOMBAT;
01451             }
01452             else
01453             {
01454                   gubBestToMakeSightingSize = BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_NONCOMBAT;
01455             }
01456       }
01457       else if ( ubAllowInterrupts )
01458       {
01459             HandleBestSightingPositionInTurnbased();
01460             // reset sighting size to 0
01461             gubBestToMakeSightingSize = BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_INCOMBAT;
01462       }
01463 
01464  /*
01465 
01466  // do this here as well as in overhead so the looks/interrupts are combined!
01467 
01468  // if a door was recently opened/closed (doesn't matter if we could see it)
01469  // this is done here so we can first handle everyone looking through the
01470  // door, and deal with the resulting opplist changes, interrupts, etc.
01471  if (Status.doorCreakedGridno != NOWHERE)
01472   {
01473    // opening/closing a door makes a bit of noise (constant volume)
01474    MakeNoise(Status.doorCreakedGuynum,Status.doorCreakedGridno,TTypeList[Grid[Status.doorCreakedGridno].land],DOOR_NOISE_VOLUME,NOISE_CREAKING,EXPECTED_NOSEND);
01475 
01476    Status.doorCreakedGridno = NOWHERE;
01477    Status.doorCreakedGuynum = NOBODY;
01478   }
01479 
01480 
01481  // all soldiers now radio their findings (NO interrupts permitted this early!)
01482  // NEW: our entire team must radio first, so that they radio about EVERYBODY
01483  // rather radioing about individuals one a a time (repeats see 1 enemy quote)
01484  for (cnt = Status.team[Net.pnum].guystart,ptr = MercPtrs[cnt]; cnt < Status.team[Net.pnum].guyend; cnt++,ptr++)
01485   {
01486    if (ptr->active && ptr->in_sector && (ptr->life >= OKLIFE))
01487      HandleSight(ptr,SIGHT_RADIO);      // looking was done above
01488   }
01489 
01490  for (cnt = 0,ptr = Menptr; cnt < MAXMERCS; cnt++,ptr++)
01491   {
01492    if (ptr->active && ptr->in_sector && (ptr->life >= OKLIFE) && !PTR_OURTEAM)
01493      HandleSight(ptr,SIGHT_RADIO);      // looking was done above
01494   }
01495 
01496 
01497  // if interrupts were allowed
01498  if (allowInterrupts)
01499    // resolve interrupts against the selected character (others disallowed)
01500    HandleSight(MercPtrs[Status.allLookCharacter],SIGHT_INTERRUPT);
01501 
01502 
01503  // revert to normal interrupt operation
01504  InterruptOnlyGuynum = NOBODY;
01505  InterruptsAllowed = TRUE;
01506  */
01507 
01508  // reset interrupt only guynum which may have been used
01509  gubInterruptProvoker = NOBODY;
01510 }

01515 void ManLooksForOtherTeams(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
01516 {
01517  UINT32 uiLoop;
01518  SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent;
01519 
01520 
01521 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01522  DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3,
01523          String("MANLOOKSFOROTHERTEAMS ID %d(%S) team %d side %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pSoldier->bTeam,pSoldier->bSide));
01524 #endif
01525 
01526 
01527   // one soldier (pSoldier) looks for every soldier on another team (pOpponent)
01528 
01529 
01530  for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
01531  {
01532    pOpponent = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
01533 
01534        // if this soldier is around and alive
01535        if (pOpponent && pOpponent->bLife)
01536        {
01537      // and if he's on another team...
01538      if (pSoldier->bTeam != pOpponent->bTeam)
01539      {
01540 
01541                   // use both sides actual x,y co-ordinates (neither side's moving)
01542                   // if he sees this opponent...
01543                   ManLooksForMan(pSoldier,pOpponent,MANLOOKSFOROTHERTEAMS);
01544 
01545                   // OK, We now want to , if in non-combat, set visiblity to 0 if not visible still....
01546                   // This allows us to walk away from buddy and have them disappear instantly
01547                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01548                   {
01549                         if ( pOpponent->bVisible == 0) 
01550                         {
01551                               pOpponent->bVisible = -1;
01552                         }
01553                   }
01554 
01555              }
01556        }
01557  }
01558 }
01559 
01560 void HandleManNoLongerSeen( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pOpponent, INT8 * pPersOL, INT8 * pbPublOL )
01561 {
01562       // if neither side is neutral AND
01563       // if this soldier is an opponent (fights for different side)
01564       if (!CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pOpponent, pSoldier ) && !CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpponent ) && (pSoldier->bSide != pOpponent->bSide))
01565       {
01566             RemoveOneOpponent(pSoldier);
01567       }
01568 
01569       // change personal opplist to indicate "seen this turn"
01570       // don't use UpdatePersonal() here, because we're changing to a *lower*
01571       // opplist value (which UpdatePersonal ignores) and we're not updating
01572       // the lastKnown gridno at all, we're keeping it at its previous value
01573        /*
01574 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
01575    fprintf(OpplistFile,"ManLooksForMan: changing personalOpplist to %d for guynum %d, opp %d\n",SEEN_THIS_TURN,ptr->guynum,oppPtr->guynum);
01576 #endif
01577        */
01578 
01579       *pPersOL = SEEN_THIS_TURN;
01580 
01581       if ( (pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP) && (pOpponent->bTeam == gbPlayerNum ) )
01582       {
01583             UINT8 ubRoom;
01584 
01585             if ( InARoom( pOpponent->sGridNo, &ubRoom ) && IN_BROTHEL( ubRoom ) && ( IN_BROTHEL_GUARD_ROOM( ubRoom ) ) )
01586             {
01587                   // unauthorized!
01588                   // make guard run to block guard room
01589                   CancelAIAction( pSoldier, TRUE );
01590                   RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->AICounter, 0 ); 
01591                   pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_RUN;
01592                   pSoldier->usNextActionData = 13250;
01593             }
01594       }
01595 
01596       // if opponent was seen publicly last time
01597       if (*pbPublOL == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
01598       {
01599             // check if I was the only one who was seeing this guy (exlude ourselves)
01600             // THIS MUST HAPPEN EVEN FOR ENEMIES, TO MAKE THEIR PUBLIC opplist DECAY!
01601             if (TeamNoLongerSeesMan(pSoldier->bTeam,pOpponent,pSoldier->ubID, 0 ))
01602             {
01603 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01604                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "TeamNoLongerSeesMan: ID %d(%S) to ID %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID) );
01605 #endif
01606 
01607 
01608 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
01609                   fprintf(OpplistFile,"TeamNoLongerSeesMan returns TRUE for team %d, opp %d\n",ptr->team,oppPtr->guynum);
01610                   fprintf(OpplistFile,"ManLooksForMan: changing publicOpplist to %d for team %d, opp %d\n",SEEN_THIS_TURN,ptr->team,oppPtr->guynum);
01611 #endif
01612 
01613                   // don't use UpdatePublic() here, because we're changing to a *lower*
01614                   // opplist value (which UpdatePublic ignores) and we're not updating
01615                   // the lastKnown gridno at all, we're keeping it at its previous value
01616                   *pbPublOL = SEEN_THIS_TURN;
01617 
01618                   // ATE: Set visiblity to 0
01619 #ifdef WE_SEE_WHAT_MILITIA_SEES_AND_VICE_VERSA
01620                   if ( (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum || pSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM) && !(pOpponent->bTeam == gbPlayerNum || pOpponent->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM ) )
01621 #else
01622                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pOpponent->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01623 #endif
01624                   {
01625                         pOpponent->bVisible = 0;
01626                   }
01627             }
01628       }
01629 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01630       else  
01631             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ManLooksForMan: ID %d(%S) to ID %d Personally seen, public %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID,*pbPublOL) );
01632 #endif
01633 
01634       // if we had only seen the guy for an instant and now lost sight of him
01635       if (gbSeenOpponents[pSoldier->ubID][pOpponent->ubID] == -1)
01636             // we can't leave it -1, because InterruptDuel() uses the special -1
01637             // value to know if we're only JUST seen the guy and screw up otherwise
01638             // it's enough to know we have seen him before
01639             gbSeenOpponents[pSoldier->ubID][pOpponent->ubID] = TRUE;
01640 
01641 }

01643 
01644 INT16 ManLooksForMan(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent, UINT8 ubCaller)
01645 {
01646  INT8 bDir,bAware = FALSE,bSuccess = FALSE;
01647  INT16 sDistVisible,sDistAway;
01648  INT8  *pPersOL,*pbPublOL;
01649 
01650 
01651  /*
01652  if (ptr->guynum >= NOBODY)
01653   {
01654 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01655    NumMessage("ManLooksForMan: ERROR - ptr->guynum = ",ptr->guynum);
01656 #endif
01657    return(success);
01658   }
01659 
01660  if (oppPtr->guynum >= NOBODY)
01661   {
01662 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01663    NumMessage("ManLooksForMan: ERROR - oppPtr->guynum = ",oppPtr->guynum);
01664 #endif
01665    return(success);
01666   }
01667 
01668 */
01669 
01670  // if we're somehow looking while inactive, at base, dead or dying
01671  if (!pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector || (pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE))
01672  {
01673 /*
01674 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01675    sprintf(tempstr,"ManLooksForMan: ERROR - %s is looking while inactive/at base/dead/dying.  Caller %s",
01676                   ExtMen[ptr->guynum].name,LastCaller2Text[caller]);
01677 
01678 #ifdef RECORDNET
01679    fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\n\t%s\n\n",tempstr);
01680 #endif
01681 
01682    PopMessage(tempstr);
01683 #endif
01684 */
01685 
01686 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01687       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
01688                   String("ERROR: ManLooksForMan - WE are inactive/dead etc ID %d(%S)to ID %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID) );
01689 #endif
01690 
01691    return(FALSE);
01692   }
01693 
01694 
01695 
01696  // if we're somehow looking for a guy who is inactive, at base, or already dead
01697  if (!pOpponent->bActive || !pOpponent->bInSector || pOpponent->bLife <= 0 || pOpponent->sGridNo == NOWHERE )
01698  {
01699 /*
01700 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01701    sprintf(tempstr,"ManLooksForMan: ERROR - %s looks for %s, who is inactive/at base/dead.  Caller %s",
01702       ExtMen[ptr->guynum].name,ExtMen[oppPtr->guynum].name,LastCaller2Text[caller]);
01703 
01704 #ifdef RECORDNET
01705    fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\n\t%s\n\n",tempstr);
01706 #endif
01707 
01708    PopMessage(tempstr);
01709 #endif
01710 */
01711 
01712 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01713        DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
01714                   String("ERROR: ManLooksForMan - TARGET is inactive etc ID %d(%S)to ID %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID) );
01715 #endif
01716 
01717    return(FALSE);
01718  }
01719 
01720 
01721  // if he's looking for a guy who is on the same team
01722  if (pSoldier->bTeam == pOpponent->bTeam)
01723   {
01724 /*
01725 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01726    sprintf(tempstr,"ManLooksFormMan: ERROR - on SAME TEAM.  ptr->guynum = %d, oppPtr->guynum = %d",
01727                               ptr->guynum,oppPtr->guynum);
01728 #ifdef RECORDNET
01729    fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\n\t%s\n\n",tempstr);
01730 #endif
01731 
01732    PopMessage(tempstr);
01733 #endif
01734 */
01735 
01736 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01737       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
01738                   String("ERROR: ManLooksForMan - SAME TEAM ID %d(%S)to ID %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID) );
01739 #endif
01740 
01741    return(FALSE);
01742   }
01743 
01744       if (pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE || pSoldier->fMercAsleep == TRUE )
01745       {
01746             return( FALSE );
01747       }
01748 
01749  // NEED TO CHANGE THIS
01750  /*
01751  // don't allow unconscious persons to look, but COLLAPSED, etc. is OK
01752  if (ptr->anitype[ptr->anim] == UNCONSCIOUS)
01753    return(success);
01754 */
01755 
01756       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == LARVAE_MONSTER || (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE && pSoldier->bTeam == OUR_TEAM) )
01757       {
01758             // don't do sight for these
01759             return( FALSE );
01760       }
01761 
01762 
01763  /*
01764  if (ptrProjected)
01765   {
01766    // use looker's PROJECTED x,y co-ordinates (those of his next gridno)
01767    fromX = ptr->destx;
01768    fromY = ptr->desty;
01769    fromGridno = ExtMen[ptr->guynum].nextGridno;
01770   }
01771  else
01772   {
01773    // use looker's ACTUAL x,y co-ordinates (those of gridno he's in now)
01774    fromX = ptr->x;
01775    fromY = ptr->y;
01776    fromGridno = ptr->sGridNo;
01777   }
01778 
01779 
01780  if (oppPtrProjected)
01781   {
01782    // use target's PROJECTED x,y co-ordinates (those of his next gridno)
01783    toX = oppPtr->destx;
01784    toY = oppPtr->desty;
01785    toGridno = ExtMen[oppPtr->guynum].nextGridno;
01786   }
01787  else
01788   {
01789    // use target's ACTUAL x,y co-ordinates (those of gridno he's in now)
01790    toX = oppPtr->x;
01791    toY = oppPtr->y;
01792    toGridno = oppPtr->gridno;
01793   }
01794 */
01795 
01796  pPersOL = &(pSoldier->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID]);
01797  pbPublOL = &(gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam][pOpponent->ubID]);
01798 
01799 
01800  // if soldier is known about (SEEN or HEARD within last few turns)
01801  if (*pPersOL || *pbPublOL)
01802   {
01803    bAware = TRUE;
01804 
01805    // then we look for him full viewing distance in EVERY direction
01806    sDistVisible = DistanceVisible(pSoldier, (SoldierHasLimitedVision(pSoldier) ? pSoldier->bDesiredDirection : DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT), 0, pOpponent->sGridNo, pOpponent->bLevel, pOpponent );
01807        //if (pSoldier->ubID == 0)
01808             //sprintf(gDebugStr,"ALREADY KNOW: ME %d him %d val %d",pSoldier->ubID,pOpponent->ubID,pSoldier->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID]);
01809   }
01810  else   // soldier is not currently known about
01811   {
01812    // distance we "see" then depends on the direction he is located from us
01813    bDir = atan8(pSoldier->sX,pSoldier->sY,pOpponent->sX,pOpponent->sY);
01814    // BIG NOTE: must use desdir instead of direction, since in a projected
01815    // situation, the direction may still be changing if it's one of the first
01816    // few animation steps when this guy's turn to do his stepped look comes up
01817    sDistVisible = DistanceVisible(pSoldier,pSoldier->bDesiredDirection,bDir, pOpponent->sGridNo, pOpponent->bLevel, pOpponent );
01818        //if (pSoldier->ubID == 0)
01819              //sprintf(gDebugStr,"dist visible %d: my dir %d to him %d",sDistVisible,pSoldier->bDesiredDirection,bDir);
01820   }
01821 
01822  // calculate how many spaces away soldier is (using Pythagoras' theorem)
01823  sDistAway = PythSpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,pOpponent->sGridNo);
01824 
01825 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01826       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "MANLOOKSFORMAN: ID %d(%S) to ID %d: sDistAway %d sDistVisible %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID,sDistAway,sDistVisible) );
01827 #endif
01828 
01829  // if we see close enough to see the soldier
01830  if (sDistAway <= sDistVisible)
01831   {
01832    // and we can trace a line of sight to his x,y coordinates
01833    // must use the REAL opplist value here since we may or may not know of him
01834    if (SoldierToSoldierLineOfSightTest(pSoldier,pOpponent,(UINT8)sDistVisible,bAware))
01835     {
01836                   ManSeesMan(pSoldier,pOpponent,pOpponent->sGridNo,pOpponent->bLevel,MANLOOKSFORMAN,ubCaller);
01837                   bSuccess = TRUE;
01838     }
01839 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01840        else
01841                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FAILED LINEOFSIGHT: ID %d (%S)to ID %d Personally %d, public %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID,*pPersOL,*pbPublOL) );
01842 #endif
01843 
01844 /*
01845    // if we're looking for a local merc, and changed doors were in the way
01846    if (PTR_OURTEAM && (NextFreeDoorIndex > 0))
01847      // make or fail, if we passed through any "changed" doors along the way,
01848      // reveal their true status (change the structure to its real value)
01849      // (do this even if we don't have LOS, to close doors that *BREAK* LOS)
01850      RevealDoorsAlongLOS();
01851 */
01852 
01853  }
01854 
01855 
01856 
01857 /*
01858 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
01859  fprintf(OpplistFile,"MLFM: %s by %2d(g%4d,x%3d,y%3d,%s) at %2d(g%4d,x%3d,y%3d,%s), aware %d, dA=%d,dV=%d, desDir=%d, %s\n",
01860             (success) ? "SCS" : "FLR",
01861             ptr->guynum,fromGridno,fromX,fromY,(ptrProjected)?"PROJ":"REG.",
01862             oppPtr->guynum,toGridno,toX,toY,(oppPtrProjected)?"PROJ":"REG.",
01863             aware,distAway,distVisible,ptr->desdir,
01864             LastCaller2Text[caller]);
01865 #endif
01866 */
01867 
01868  // if soldier seen personally LAST time could not be seen THIS time
01869  if (!bSuccess && (*pPersOL == SEEN_CURRENTLY))
01870  {
01871             HandleManNoLongerSeen( pSoldier, pOpponent, pPersOL, pbPublOL );
01872  }
01873  else
01874  {
01875       if (!bSuccess)
01876       {
01877 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01878             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("NO LONGER VISIBLE ID %d (%S)to ID %d Personally %d, public %d success: %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID,*pPersOL,*pbPublOL,bSuccess) );
01879 #endif
01880             
01881             
01882             // we didn't see the opponent, but since we didn't last time, we should be
01883             //if (*pbPublOL)
01884                   //pOpponent->bVisible = TRUE;
01885       }
01886 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
01887       else
01888             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("COOL. STILL VISIBLE ID %d (%S)to ID %d Personally %d, public %d success: %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID,*pPersOL,*pbPublOL,bSuccess) );
01889 #endif
01890 
01891       
01892       
01893 }
01894 
01895 
01896 
01897  return(bSuccess);
01898 }

01904 {
01905  INT8 bDoLocate = FALSE;
01906  BOOLEAN fNewOpponent = FALSE;
01907  BOOLEAN fNotAddedToList = TRUE;
01908  INT8 bOldOppList = pSoldier->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID];
01909       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"ManSeesMan");
01910 
01911  if (pSoldier->ubID >= NOBODY)
01912   {
01913        /*
01914 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01915    NumMessage("ManSeesMan: ERROR - ptr->guynum = ",ptr->guynum);
01916 #endif
01917        */
01918    return;
01919   }
01920

01922   {
01923        /*
01924 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01925    NumMessage("ManSeesMan: ERROR - oppPtr->guynum = ",oppPtr->guynum);
01926 #endif
01927        */
01928    return;
01929   }
01930 
01931  // if we're somehow looking while inactive, at base, dying or already dead
01932  if (!pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector || (pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE))
01933   {
01934        /*
01935 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01936    sprintf(tempstr,"ManSeesMan: ERROR - %s is SEEING ManSeesMan while inactive/at base/dead/dying",ExtMen[ptr->guynum].name);
01937    PopMessage(tempstr);
01938 #endif
01939       */
01940    return;
01941   }
01942 
01943  // if we're somehow seeing a guy who is inactive, at base, or already dead
01944  if (!pOpponent->bActive || !pOpponent->bInSector || pOpponent->bLife <= 0)
01945   {
01946        /*
01947 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01948    sprintf(tempstr,"ManSeesMan: ERROR - %s sees %s, ManSeesMan, who is inactive/at base/dead",ExtMen[ptr->guynum].name,ExtMen[oppPtr->guynum].name);
01949    PopMessage(tempstr);
01950 #endif
01951        */
01952    return;
01953   }
01954 
01955 
01956  // if we're somehow seeing a guy who is on the same team
01957  if (pSoldier->bTeam == pOpponent->bTeam)
01958   {
01959        /*
01960 #ifdef BETAVERSION
01961    sprintf(tempstr,"ManSeesMan: ERROR - on SAME TEAM.  ptr->guynum = %d, oppPtr->guynum = %d",
01962                               ptr->guynum,oppPtr->guynum);
01963    PopMessage(tempstr);
01964 #endif
01965        */
01966    return;
01967   }
01968 
01969  // if we're seeing a guy we didn't see on our last chance to look for him
01970  if (pSoldier->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID] != SEEN_CURRENTLY)
01971   {
01972             if ( pOpponent->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
01973             {
01974                   if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
01975                   {
01976                         if ( pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM )
01977                         {
01978                               // if this person doing the sighting is a member of a civ group that hates us but 
01979                               // this fact hasn't been revealed, change the side of these people now. This will
01980                               // make them non-neutral so AddOneOpponent will be called, and the guy will say his
01981                               // "I hate you" quote
01982                               if ( pSoldier->bNeutral )
01983                               {
01984                                     if ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup != NON_CIV_GROUP && gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup ] >= CIV_GROUP_WILL_BECOME_HOSTILE )
01985                                     {

01987                                           fNotAddedToList = FALSE;
01988                                     }
01989                               }
01990                               else if ( NPCHasUnusedRecordWithGivenApproach( pSoldier->ubProfile, APPROACH_DECLARATION_OF_HOSTILITY ) )
01991                               {
01992                                     // only add if have something to say
01993                                     AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( pSoldier->ubID );
01994                                     fNotAddedToList = FALSE;
01995                               }
01996                               
01997                               if ( fNotAddedToList )
01998                               {
01999                                     switch( pSoldier->ubProfile )
02000                                     {
02001                                           case CARMEN:
02002                                                 if (pOpponent->ubProfile == SLAY ) // 64
02003                                                 {
02004                                                       // Carmen goes to war (against Slay)
02005                                                       if ( pSoldier->bNeutral )
02006                                                       {
02007                                                             //SetSoldierNonNeutral( pSoldier );
02008                                                             pSoldier->bAttitude = ATTACKSLAYONLY;
02009                                                             TriggerNPCRecord( pSoldier->ubProfile, 28 );
02010                                                       }
02011                                                       /*
02012                                                       if ( ! gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
02013                                                       {
02014                                                             EnterCombatMode( pSoldier->bTeam );
02015                                                       }
02016                                                       */
02017                                                 }
02018                                                 break;
02019                                           case ELDIN:
02020                                                 if ( pSoldier->bNeutral )
02021                                                 {
02022                                                       UINT8 ubRoom = 0;
02023                                                       // if player is in behind the ropes of the museum display

02025                                                       InARoom( pOpponent->sGridNo, &ubRoom );
02026

02028                                                       {

02032                                                 }
02033                                                 break;

02035                                           case JACK:

02040                                                 // change orders, reset action!

02066                                                       TriggerNPCRecord( ANGEL, 20 );
02067                                                       // trigger Angel to walk off afterwards
02068                                                       //TriggerNPCRecord( ANGEL, 24 );
02069                                                 }
02070                                                 break;
02071                                           //case QUEEN:
02072                                           case JOE:
02073                                           case ELLIOT:

02080                                                       }
02081                                                 }

02084                                                 break;
02085                                     }
02086                               }
02087                         }
02088                         else

02090                               switch( pSoldier->ubProfile )
02091                               {
02092                                     /*
02093                                     case MIKE:
02094                                           if ( gfPlayerTeamSawMike && !( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags2 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_SAID_FIRSTSEEN_QUOTE ) )
02095                                           {

02100                                           */

02102                                           if ( ! ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags2 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_SAID_FIRSTSEEN_QUOTE ) )

02104                                                 TriggerNPCRecord( pSoldier->ubProfile, 9 );
02105                                                 gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags2 |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_SAID_FIRSTSEEN_QUOTE;
02106                                                 gbPublicOpplist[ gbPlayerNum ][ pSoldier->ubID ] = HEARD_THIS_TURN;
02107                                           }

02109                               }
02110                         }
02111                   }
02112                   else
02113                   {
02114                         if ( pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM )
02115                         {
02116                               if ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup != NON_CIV_GROUP && gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup ] >= CIV_GROUP_WILL_BECOME_HOSTILE && pSoldier->bNeutral )

02121                               {

02123

02137

02139                                           //if ( InARoom( pOpponent->sGridNo, &ubRoom ) && IN_BROTHEL( ubRoom ) && ( gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData == 0 || IN_BROTHEL_GUARD_ROOM( ubRoom ) ) )
02140                                           if ( InARoom( pOpponent->sGridNo, &ubRoom ) && IN_BROTHEL_GUARD_ROOM( ubRoom ) )
02141                                           {
02142                                                 // unauthorized!
02143                                                 MakeCivHostile( pSoldier, 2 );
02144                                                 if ( ! (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )

02151                               else if ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == HICKS_CIV_GROUP && CheckFact( FACT_HICKS_MARRIED_PLAYER_MERC, 0 ) == FALSE )
02152                               {
02153                                     UINT32      uiTime;
02154             INT16 sX, sY;
02155 
02156                                     // if before 6:05 or after 22:00, make hostile and enter combat
02157                                     uiTime = GetWorldMinutesInDay();
02158                                     if ( uiTime < 365 || uiTime > 1320 )

02165

02167                     GetSoldierScreenPos( pSoldier, &sX, &sY );

02190         gfPlayerTeamSawJoey = TRUE;
