02193 
02194       // as soon as a bloodcat sees someone, it becomes hostile
02195       // this is safe to do here because we haven't made this new person someone we've seen yet
02196       // (so we are assured we won't count 'em twice for oppcnt purposes)
02197       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
02198       {
02199     if ( pSoldier->bNeutral )
02200     {
02201                   MakeBloodcatsHostile();
02202                   /*
02203               SetSoldierNonNeutral( pSoldier );
02204               RecalculateOppCntsDueToNoLongerNeutral( pSoldier );
02205               if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02206               {
02207                     CheckForPotentialAddToBattleIncrement( pSoldier );
02208               }
02209                   */
02210 
02211       PlayJA2Sample( BLOODCAT_ROAR, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
02212     }
02213     else
02214     {
02215       if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt == 0 )
02216       {
02217         if ( Random( 2 ) == 0 )
02218         {
02219           PlayJA2Sample( BLOODCAT_ROAR, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
02220         }
02221       }
02222     }
02223       }
02224       else if ( pOpponent->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT && pOpponent->bNeutral)
02225       {
02226             MakeBloodcatsHostile();
02227             /*
02228             SetSoldierNonNeutral( pOpponent );
02229             RecalculateOppCntsDueToNoLongerNeutral( pOpponent );
02230             if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02231             {
02232                   CheckForPotentialAddToBattleIncrement( pOpponent );
02233             }
02234             */
02235       }
02236 
02237    // if both of us are not neutral, AND
02238    // if this man is actually a true opponent (we're not on the same side)
02239    if (!CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pOpponent, pSoldier ) && !CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpponent ) && (pSoldier->bSide != pOpponent->bSide))
02240        {
02241      AddOneOpponent(pSoldier);
02242 
02243 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
02244              DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "ManSeesMan: ID %d(%S) to ID %d NEW TO ME",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID) );  
02245 #endif
02246 
02247      // if we also haven't seen him earlier this turn
02248      if (pSoldier->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID] != SEEN_THIS_TURN)
02249       {
02250                    fNewOpponent = TRUE;
02251        pSoldier->bNewOppCnt++;        // increment looker's NEW opponent count
02252                    //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Soldier %d sees soldier %d!", pSoldier->ubID, pOpponent->ubID );
02253 
02254                    //ExtMen[ptr->guynum].lastCaller = caller;
02255        //ExtMen[ptr->guynum].lastCaller2 = caller2;
02256 
02257                         IncrementWatchedLoc( pSoldier->ubID, pOpponent->sGridNo, pOpponent->bLevel );
02258                         
02259                         if ( pSoldier->bTeam == OUR_TEAM && pOpponent->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
02260                         {
02261                               if ( CheckFact( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_FOUGHT, 0 ) == FALSE )
02262                               {
02263                                     SetFactTrue( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_BEING_FOUGHT );
02264                               }
02265                         }
02266 
02267 
02268       }
02269                   else
02270                   {
02271                         SetWatchedLocAsUsed( pSoldier->ubID, pOpponent->sGridNo, pOpponent->bLevel );
02272                   }
02273 
02274      // we already know the soldier isn't SEEN_CURRENTLY,
02275      // now check if he is really "NEW" ie. not expected to be there
02276 
02277      // if the looker hasn't seen this opponent at all earlier this turn, OR
02278      // if the opponent is not where the looker last thought him to be
02279      if ((pSoldier->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID] != SEEN_THIS_TURN) ||
02280          (gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID][pOpponent->ubID] != sOppGridno))
02281               {
02282                         SetNewSituation( pSoldier );  // force the looker to re-evaluate
02283                   }
02284      else
02285       {
02286        // if we in a non-combat movement decision, presumably this is not
02287        // something we were quite expecting, so make a new decision.  For
02288        // other (combat) movement decisions, we took his position into account
02289        // when we made it, so don't make us think again & slow things down.
02290        switch (pSoldier->bAction)
02291                         {
02292                          case AI_ACTION_RANDOM_PATROL:
02293                          case AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT:
02294                          case AI_ACTION_SEEK_FRIEND:
02295                          case AI_ACTION_POINT_PATROL:
02296                          case AI_ACTION_LEAVE_WATER_GAS:
02297                          case AI_ACTION_SEEK_NOISE:
02298                                SetNewSituation( pSoldier );  // force the looker to re-evaluate
02299                                break;
02300                         }
02301       }
02302     }
02303 
02304   }
02305 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
02306 else
02307   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "ManSeesMan: ID %d(%S) to ID %d ALREADYSEENCURRENTLY",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID) );  
02308 #endif
02309       //bOldOppValue = pSoldier->bOppList[ pOpponent->ubID ];
02310  // remember that the soldier is currently seen and his new location
02311  UpdatePersonal(pSoldier,pOpponent->ubID,SEEN_CURRENTLY,sOppGridno,bOppLevel);
02312 
02313  if ( ubCaller2 == MANLOOKSFOROTHERTEAMS || ubCaller2 == OTHERTEAMSLOOKFORMAN || ubCaller2 == CALLER_UNKNOWN ) // unknown->hearing
02314  {
02315 
02316       if ( gubBestToMakeSightingSize != BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_INCOMBAT && gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == NOT_BOXING )
02317       {
02318             if ( fNewOpponent )
02319             {
02320                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
02321                   {
02322                         // presumably a door opening... we do require standard interrupt conditions                     
02323                         if (StandardInterruptConditionsMet(pSoldier,pOpponent->ubID,bOldOppList))
02324                         {
02325                               ReevaluateBestSightingPosition( pSoldier, CalcInterruptDuelPts( pSoldier, pOpponent->ubID, TRUE ) );
02326                         }
02327                   }
02328                   // require the enemy not to be dying if we are the sighter; in other words,
02329                   // always add for AI guys, and always add for people with life >= OKLIFE
02330                   else if ( !(pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pOpponent->bLife < OKLIFE ) )
02331                   {
02332                         ReevaluateBestSightingPosition( pSoldier, CalcInterruptDuelPts( pSoldier, pOpponent->ubID, TRUE ) );
02333                   }
02334             }
02335       }
02336  }
02337 
02338  // if this man has never seen this opponent before in this sector
02339  if (gbSeenOpponents[pSoldier->ubID][pOpponent->ubID] == FALSE)
02340    // remember that he is just seeing him now for the first time (-1)
02341    gbSeenOpponents[pSoldier->ubID][pOpponent->ubID] = -1;
02342  else
02343    // man is seeing an opponent AGAIN whom he has seen at least once before
02344    gbSeenOpponents[pSoldier->ubID][pOpponent->ubID] = TRUE;
02345 
02346 
02347 
02348  // if looker is on local team, and the enemy was invisible or "maybe"
02349  // visible just prior to this
02350 #ifdef WE_SEE_WHAT_MILITIA_SEES_AND_VICE_VERSA
02351  if ( ( PTR_OURTEAM || (pSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM) ) && (pOpponent->bVisible <= 0))
02352 #else
02353  if (PTR_OURTEAM && (pOpponent->bVisible <= 0))
02354 #endif
02355   {
02356    // if opponent was truly invisible, not just turned off temporarily (FALSE)
02357    if (pOpponent->bVisible == -1)
02358        {
02359      // then locate to him and set his locator flag
02360      bDoLocate = TRUE;
02361 
02362       //rain
02363       if( gfLightningInProgress ) gfHaveSeenSomeone = TRUE;
02364       //end rain
02365        }
02366 
02367    // make opponent visible (to us)
02368    // must do this BEFORE the locate since it checks for visibility
02369    pOpponent->bVisible = TRUE;
02370 
02371        //ATE: Cancel any fading going on!
02372        // ATE: Added for fade in.....
02373        if ( pOpponent->fBeginFade == 1 || pOpponent->fBeginFade == 2 )
02374        {
02375              pOpponent->fBeginFade = FALSE;
02376 
02377             if ( pOpponent->bLevel > 0 && gpWorldLevelData[ pOpponent->sGridNo ].pRoofHead != NULL )
02378             {
02379                   pOpponent->ubFadeLevel = gpWorldLevelData[ pOpponent->sGridNo ].pRoofHead->ubShadeLevel;
02380             }
02381             else
02382             {
02383                   pOpponent->ubFadeLevel = gpWorldLevelData[ pOpponent->sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel;
02384             }
02385 
02386              // Set levelnode shade level....
02387              if ( pOpponent->pLevelNode )
02388              {
02389                    pOpponent->pLevelNode->ubShadeLevel = pOpponent->ubFadeLevel;
02390              }
02391        }
02392 
02393  
02394 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
02395        DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!! ID %d (%S) MAKING %d VISIBLE",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,pOpponent->ubID) );
02396 #endif
02397 
02398    // update variable for STATUS screen
02399    //pOpponent->bLastKnownLife = pOpponent->life;
02400 
02401    if (bDoLocate)
02402     {
02403 
02404              // Change his anim speed!
02405              SetSoldierAniSpeed( pOpponent );
02406 
02407      // if show enemies is ON, then we must have already revealed these roofs
02408      // and we're also following his movements, so don't bother sliding
02409      if (!gbShowEnemies)
02410       {
02411        //DoSoldierRoofs(pOpponent);
02412 
02413        // slide to the newly seen opponent, and if appropriate, start his locator
02414        //SlideToMe = oppPtr->guynum;
02415       }
02416 
02417      //LastOpponentLocatedTo = oppPtr->guynum;
02418 
02419              /*
02420 #ifdef RECORDNET
02421      fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\tManSeesMan - LOCATE\n");
02422 #endif
02423              */
02424 
02425 
02426              if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) | gTacticalStatus.fVirginSector ) )
02427              {
02428                    if (!pOpponent->bNeutral && (pSoldier->bSide != pOpponent->bSide))
02429                    {
02430                               //SlideTo(0,pOpponent->ubID, pSoldier->ubID, SETLOCATOR);
02431                               //rain
02432                               SlideTo(0,pOpponent->ubID, pSoldier->ubID, SETLOCATORFAST);
02433                               //end rain
02434                    }
02435              }
02436     }
02437 
02438 
02439   }
02440       else if (!PTR_OURTEAM)
02441       {
02442        // ATE: Check stance, change to threatending
02443        ReevaluateEnemyStance( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
02444       }
02445 
02446 }

02449 void DecideTrueVisibility(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubLocate)
02450 {
02451  // if his visibility is still in the special "limbo" state (FALSE)
02452  if (pSoldier->bVisible == FALSE)
02453  {
02454    // then none of our team's merc turned him visible,
02455    // therefore he now becomes truly invisible
02456    pSoldier->bVisible = -1;
02457 
02458        // Don;t adjust anim speed here, it's done once fade is over!
02459       }
02460 
02461 
02462  // If soldier is not visible, make sure his red "locator" is turned off
02463  //if ((pSoldier->bVisible < 0) && !gbShowEnemies)
02464       //    pSoldier->bLocator = FALSE;
02465 
02466 
02467  if (ubLocate)
02468   {
02469    // if he remains visible (or ShowEnemies ON)
02470    if ((pSoldier->bVisible >= 0) || gbShowEnemies)
02471     {
02472              /*
02473 #ifdef RECORDNET
02474      fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\tDecideTrueVisibility - LOCATE\n");
02475 #endif
02476       */
02477 
02478     if (PTR_OURTEAM)
02479      {
02480       //if (ConfigOptions[FOLLOWMODE] && Status.stopSlidingAt == NOBODY)
02481         //  LocateMember(ptr->guynum,DONTSETLOCATOR);
02482      }
02483     else // not our team - if we're NOT allied then locate...
02484      //if (pSoldier->side != gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].side && ConfigOptions[FOLLOWMODE])
02485        //if (Status.stopSlidingAt == NOBODY)
02486                         if (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02487           //LocateSoldier(pSoldier->ubID,DONTSETLOCATOR);
02488                               SlideTo(0,pSoldier->ubID, NOBODY, DONTSETLOCATOR);
02489 
02490      // follow his movement on our screen as he moves around...
02491      //LocateMember(ptr->guynum,DONTSETLOCATOR);
02492     }
02493   }
02494 }

02499 
02500 void OtherTeamsLookForMan(SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent)
02501 {
02502       UINT32 uiLoop;
02503       INT8 bOldOppList;
02504       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02505 
02506 
02507       //NumMessage("OtherTeamsLookForMan, guy#",oppPtr->guynum);
02508 
02509       // if the guy we're looking for is NOT on our team AND is currently visible
02510 #ifdef WE_SEE_WHAT_MILITIA_SEES_AND_VICE_VERSA
02511       if ((pOpponent->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && pOpponent->bTeam != MILITIA_TEAM) && (pOpponent->bVisible >= 0 && pOpponent->bVisible < 2) && pOpponent->bLife)
02512 #else
02513       if ((pOpponent->bTeam != gbPlayerNum) && (pOpponent->bVisible >= 0 && pOpponent->bVisible < 2) && pOpponent->bLife)
02514 #endif
02515       {
02516             // assume he's no longer visible, until one of our mercs sees him again
02517             pOpponent->bVisible = 0;
02518       }
02519 
02520 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
02521       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
02522                   String("OTHERTEAMSLOOKFORMAN ID %d(%S) team %d side %d",pOpponent->ubID,pOpponent->name,pOpponent->bTeam,pOpponent->bSide ));
02523 #endif
02524 
02525 
02526       // all soldiers not on oppPtr's team now look for him
02527       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
02528       {
02529             pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
02530 
02531             // if this merc is active, in this sector, and well enough to look
02532             if (pSoldier != NULL && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE  && (pSoldier->ubBodyType != LARVAE_MONSTER))
02533             {
02534                   // if this merc is on the same team as the target soldier
02535                   if (pSoldier->bTeam == pOpponent->bTeam)
02536                   {
02537                         continue;        // he doesn't look (he ALWAYS knows about him)
02538                   }
02539 
02540                   bOldOppList = pSoldier->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID];
02541 
02542                   // this merc looks for the soldier in question
02543                   // use both sides actual x,y co-ordinates (neither side's moving)
02544                   if (ManLooksForMan(pSoldier,pOpponent,OTHERTEAMSLOOKFORMAN))
02545                   {
02546                         // if a new opponent is seen (which must be oppPtr himself)
02547                         //if ((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && pSoldier->bNewOppCnt)
02548                         // Calc interrupt points in non-combat because we might get an interrupt or be interrupted
02549                         // on our first turn
02550 
02551                         // if doing regular in-combat sighting (not on opening doors!)
02552                         if ( gubBestToMakeSightingSize == BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_INCOMBAT )
02553                         {
02554                               if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && pSoldier->bNewOppCnt )
02555                               {
02556                                     // as long as viewer meets minimum interrupt conditions
02557                                     if ( gubSightFlags & SIGHT_INTERRUPT && StandardInterruptConditionsMet(pSoldier,pOpponent->ubID,bOldOppList))
02558                                     {
02559                                           // calculate the interrupt duel points                                  
02560                                           pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts = CalcInterruptDuelPts(pSoldier, pOpponent->ubID, TRUE);
02561                                           DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Calculating int duel pts in OtherTeamsLookForMan, %d has %d points", pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts ) );
02562                                     }
02563                                     else
02564                                     {
02565                                           pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts = NO_INTERRUPT;
02566                                     }
02567                               }
02568                         }
02569                   }
02570 
02571                   // if "Show only enemies seen" option is ON and it's this guy looking
02572                   //if (ptr->guynum == ShowOnlySeenPerson)
02573                   //NewShowOnlySeenPerson(ptr);                  // update the string
02574             }
02575       }
02576 
02577 
02578       // if he's not on our team
02579       if (pOpponent->bTeam != gbPlayerNum)
02580       {
02581    // don't do a locate here, it's already done by Man Sees Man for new opps.
02582    DecideTrueVisibility(pOpponent,NOLOCATE);
02583       }
02584 }
02585 
02586 void AddOneOpponent(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
02587 {
02588       INT8 bOldOppCnt = pSoldier->bOppCnt;
02589 
02590       pSoldier->bOppCnt++;
02591 
02592       if (!bOldOppCnt)
02593       {
02594             // if we hadn't known about opponents being here for sure prior to this
02595             if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == LARVAE_MONSTER)
02596             {
02597                   // never become aware of you!
02598                   return;
02599             }
02600 
02601             if (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED)
02602             {
02603                   CheckForChangingOrders(pSoldier);
02604             }
02605 
02606             pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_BLACK;   // force black AI status right away
02607 
02608             if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
02609             {
02610                   pSoldier->ubCaller = NOBODY;
02611                   pSoldier->bCallPriority = 0;
02612             }
02613       }
02614 
02615       if (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
02616       {
02617             // adding an opponent for player; reset # of turns that we haven't seen an enemy
02618             gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsNotSeen = 0;
02619       }
02620 
02621 }
02622 
02623 
02624 
02625 void RemoveOneOpponent(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
02626 {
02627  pSoldier->bOppCnt--;
02628 
02629  if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt < 0 )
02630  {
02631        DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Oppcnt for %d (%s) tried to go below 0", pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->name ) );
02632        #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02633             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK,  L"Opponent counter dropped below 0 for person %d (%s).  Please inform Sir-tech of this, and what has just been happening in the game.", pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->name );
02634        #endif
02635        pSoldier->bOppCnt = 0;
02636  }
02637 
02638  // if no opponents remain in sight, drop status to RED (but NOT newSit.!)
02639  if (!pSoldier->bOppCnt)
02640    pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
02641 }

02709

02712 */

02718 
02719 
02720 }

02725 
02726 
02727 void UpdatePublic(UINT8 ubTeam, UINT8 ubID, INT8 bNewOpplist, INT16 sGridno, INT8 bLevel)
02728 {
02729  INT32 cnt;
02730  INT8 *pbPublOL;
02731  UINT8 ubTeamMustLookAgain = FALSE, ubMadeDifference = FALSE;
02732  SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02733 
02734 
02735  pbPublOL = &(gbPublicOpplist[ubTeam][ubID]);
02736 
02737  // if new opplist is more up-to-date, or we are just wiping it for some reason
02738  if ((gubKnowledgeValue[*pbPublOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE][bNewOpplist - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE] > 0) ||
02739      (bNewOpplist == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN))
02740   {
02741    // if this team is becoming aware of a soldier it wasn't previously aware of
02742    if ((bNewOpplist != NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN) && (*pbPublOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN))
02743      ubTeamMustLookAgain = TRUE;
02744 
02745    // change the public opplist *BEFORE* anyone looks again or we'll recurse!
02746    *pbPublOL = bNewOpplist;
02747   }
02748 
02749 
02750  // always update the gridno, no matter what
02751  gsPublicLastKnownOppLoc[ubTeam][ubID] = sGridno;
02752  gbPublicLastKnownOppLevel[ubTeam][ubID] = bLevel;
02753 
02754  // if team has been told about a guy the team was completely unaware of
02755  if (ubTeamMustLookAgain)
02756   {
02757    // then everyone on team who's not aware of guynum must look for him
02758    cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ubTeam].bFirstID;
02759 
02760    for (pSoldier = MercPtrs[cnt]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ubTeam].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
02761     {
02762      // if this soldier is active, in this sector, and well enough to look
02763      if (pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED ) )
02764      {
02765        // if soldier isn't aware of guynum, give him another chance to see
02766        if (pSoldier->bOppList[ubID] == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN)
02767                    {
02768                               if (ManLooksForMan(pSoldier,MercPtrs[ubID],UPDATEPUBLIC))
02769                                     // then he actually saw guynum because of our new public knowledge
02770                                     ubMadeDifference = TRUE;
02771 
02772                               // whether successful or not, whack newOppCnt.  Since this is a
02773                               // delayed reaction to a radio call, there's no chance of interrupt!
02774                               pSoldier->bNewOppCnt = 0;
02775 
02776                               // if "Show only enemies seen" option is ON and it's this guy looking
02777                               //if (pSoldier->ubID == ShowOnlySeenPerson)
02778                                     // NewShowOnlySeenPerson(pSoldier);                  // update the string
02779                    }
02780              }
02781        }
02782  }
02783 }

02788 void UpdatePersonal(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubID, INT8 bNewOpplist, INT16 sGridno, INT8 bLevel)
02789 {
02790       /*
02791 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
02792  fprintf(OpplistFile,"UpdatePersonal - for %d about %d to %d (was %d) at g%d\n",
02793             ptr->guynum,guynum,newOpplist,ptr->opplist[guynum],gridno);
02794 #endif
02795 
02796       */
02797 
02798 
02799 
02800  // if new opplist is more up-to-date, or we are just wiping it for some reason
02801  if ((gubKnowledgeValue[pSoldier->bOppList[ubID] - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE][bNewOpplist - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE] > 0) ||
02802      (bNewOpplist == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN))
02803   {
02804    pSoldier->bOppList[ubID] = bNewOpplist;
02805   }
02806 
02807  // always update the gridno, no matter what
02808  gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID][ubID] = sGridno;
02809  gbLastKnownOppLevel[pSoldier->ubID][ubID] = bLevel;
02810 }

02815 
02816 INT8 OurMaxPublicOpplist()
02817 {
02818  UINT32 uiLoop;
02819  INT8 bHighestOpplist = 0;
02820  UINT8 ubOppValue,ubHighestValue = 0;
02821  SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
02822 
02823  for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
02824       {
02825        pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
02826 
02827        // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, or dead
02828        if (!pSoldier || !pSoldier->bLife)
02829              continue;        // next merc
02830 
02831    // if this man is NEUTRAL / on our side, he's not an opponent
02832        if (pSoldier->bNeutral || (gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bSide == Menptr[pSoldier->ubID].bSide))
02833      continue;          // next merc
02834 
02835    // opponent, check our public opplist value for him
02836    ubOppValue = gubKnowledgeValue[0 - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE][gbPublicOpplist[gbPlayerNum][pSoldier->ubID] - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE];
02837 
02838    if (ubOppValue > ubHighestValue)
02839     {
02840      ubHighestValue = ubOppValue;
02841      bHighestOpplist = gbPublicOpplist[gbPlayerNum][pSoldier->ubID];
02842     }
02843   }
02844 
02845  return(bHighestOpplist);
02846 }

02903 void ResetLastKnownLocs(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
02904 {
02905       UINT32 uiLoop;
02906 
02907       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
02908       {
02909             if (MercSlots[uiLoop])
02910             {
02911                   gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID][MercSlots[uiLoop]->ubID] = NOWHERE;
02912                   
02913                   // IAN added this June 14/97
02914                   gsPublicLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->bTeam][MercSlots[uiLoop]->ubID] = NOWHERE;
02915             }
02916       }
02917 }

02920 
02921 /*
02922 // INITIALIZATION STUFF
02923 -------------------------
02924 // Upon loading a scenario, call these:
02925 InitOpponentKnowledgeSystem();
02926 
02927 // loop through all soldiers and for each soldier call
02928 InitSoldierOpplist(pSoldier);
02929 
02930 // call this once
02931 AllTeamsLookForAll(NO_INTERRUPTS);  // no interrupts permitted this early
02932 
02933 
02934 // for each additional soldier created, call
02935 InitSoldierOpplist(pSoldier);
02936 HandleSight(pSoldier,SIGHT_LOOK);
02937 
02938 
02939 
02940 MOVEMENT STUFF
02941 -----------------
02942 // whenever new tile is reached, call
02943 HandleSight(pSoldier,SIGHT_LOOK);
02944 
02945 */
02946 
02947 void InitOpponentKnowledgeSystem(void)
02948 {
02949       INT32 iTeam, cnt, cnt2;
02950 
02951       memset(gbSeenOpponents,0,sizeof(gbSeenOpponents));
02952       memset(gbPublicOpplist,NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN,sizeof(gbPublicOpplist));
02953 
02954       for (iTeam=0; iTeam < MAXTEAMS; iTeam++)
02955       {
02956             gubPublicNoiseVolume[iTeam] = 0;
02957             gsPublicNoiseGridno[iTeam] = NOWHERE;
02958             gbPublicNoiseLevel[iTeam] = 0;
02959             for (cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; cnt++)
02960             {
02961                   gsPublicLastKnownOppLoc[ iTeam ][ cnt ] = NOWHERE;
02962             }
02963       }
02964 
02965       // initialize public last known locations for all teams
02966       for (cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; cnt++)
02967       {
02968             for (cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < NUM_WATCHED_LOCS; cnt2++ )
02969             {
02970                   gsWatchedLoc[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] = NOWHERE;
02971                   gubWatchedLocPoints[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] = 0;
02972                   gfWatchedLocReset[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] = FALSE;
02973             }
02974       }
02975 
02976       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < SHOULD_BECOME_HOSTILE_SIZE; cnt++ )
02977       {
02978             gubShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote[ cnt ] = NOBODY;
02979       }
02980 
02981       gubNumShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuote = 0;
02982 }
02983

02985 
02986 void InitSoldierOppList(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
02987 {
02988       memset(pSoldier->bOppList,NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN,sizeof(pSoldier->bOppList));
02989       pSoldier->bOppCnt = 0;
02990       ResetLastKnownLocs(pSoldier);
02991       memset(gbSeenOpponents[pSoldier->ubID],0,MAXMERCS);
02992 }

02995 void BetweenTurnsVisibilityAdjustments(void)
02996 {
02997       INT32 cnt;
02998       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02999 
03000 
03001   // make all soldiers on other teams that are no longer seen not visible
03002   for (cnt = 0, pSoldier = Menptr; cnt < MAXMERCS; cnt++,pSoldier++)
03003       {
03004             if (pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife)
03005             {
03006 #ifdef WE_SEE_WHAT_MILITIA_SEES_AND_VICE_VERSA
03007                   if (!PTR_OURTEAM && pSoldier->bTeam != MILITIA_TEAM)
03008 #else
03009                   if (!PTR_OURTEAM)
03010 #endif
03011                   {
03012                         // check if anyone on our team currently sees him (exclude NOBODY)
03013                         if (TeamNoLongerSeesMan(gbPlayerNum,pSoldier,NOBODY,0))
03014                         {
03015                               // then our team has lost sight of him
03016                               pSoldier->bVisible = -1;            // make him fully invisible
03017 
03018                               // Allow fade to adjust anim speed
03019                         }
03020                   }
03021             }
03022       }
03023 }

03025 
03026 void SaySeenQuote( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fSeenCreature, BOOLEAN fVirginSector, BOOLEAN fSeenJoey )
03027 {
03028       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
03029       UINT8                   ubNumEnemies = 0;
03030       UINT8                   ubNumAllies = 0;
03031       UINT32                  cnt;
03032 
03033       if ( AreInMeanwhile( ) )
03034       {
03035             return;
03036       }
03037 
03038       // Check out for our under large fire quote
03039       if ( !(pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_IN_SHIT ) )
03040       {
03041             // Get total enemies.
03042             // Loop through all mercs in sector and count # of enemies
03043             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
03044             {
03045                   pTeamSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
03046 
03047                   if ( pTeamSoldier != NULL )
03048                   {
03049                         if ( OK_ENEMY_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) )
03050                         {
03051                               ubNumEnemies++;
03052                         }
03053                   }
03054             }
03055 
03056             // OK, after this, check our guys
03057             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
03058             {
03059                   pTeamSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
03060 
03061                   if ( pTeamSoldier != NULL )
03062                   {
03063                         if ( !OK_ENEMY_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) )
03064                         {
03065                                if ( pTeamSoldier->bOppCnt >= ( ubNumEnemies / 2 ) )
03066                                {
03067                                           ubNumAllies++;
03068                                }
03069                         }
03070                   }
03071             }
03072 
03073             // now check!
03074             if ( ( pSoldier->bOppCnt - ubNumAllies ) > 2 )
03075             {
03076                   // Say quote!
03077                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_IN_TROUBLE_SLASH_IN_BATTLE );                  
03078 
03079                   pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_IN_SHIT;
03080 
03081                   return;
03082             }
03083             
03084       }
03085 
03086 
03087       if ( fSeenCreature == 1 )
03088       {
03089 
03090             // Is this our first time seeing them?
03091             if ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_HAVESEENCREATURE )
03092             {
03093                   // Are there multiplaes and we have not said this quote during this battle?
03094                   if ( !(     pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_MULTIPLE_CREATURES ) )
03095                   {
03096                         // Check for multiples!
03097                         ubNumEnemies = 0;
03098 
03099                         // Get total enemies.
03100                         // Loop through all mercs in sector and count # of enemies
03101                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
03102                         {
03103                               pTeamSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
03104 
03105                               if ( pTeamSoldier != NULL )
03106                               {
03107                                     if ( OK_ENEMY_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) )
03108                                     {
03109                                           if ( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER && pSoldier->bOppList[ pTeamSoldier->ubID ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
03110                                           {
03111                                                 ubNumEnemies++;
03112                                           }
03113                                     }
03114                               }
03115                         }
03116 
03117                         if ( ubNumEnemies > 2 )
03118                         {
03119                               // Yes, set flag
03120                               pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_MULTIPLE_CREATURES;
03121                               
03122                               // Say quote
03123                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_ATTACKED_BY_MULTIPLE_CREATURES );              
03124                         }     
03125                         else
03126                         {
03127                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_SEE_CREATURE );
03128                         }
03129                   }
03130                   else
03131                   {
03132                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_SEE_CREATURE );
03133                   }
03134             }
03135             else
03136             {
03137                   // Yes, set flag
03138                   gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_HAVESEENCREATURE;
03139 
03140                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_FIRSTTIME_GAME_SEE_CREATURE );                 
03141             }
03142       }
03143       // 2 is for bloodcat...
03144       else if ( fSeenCreature == 2 )
03145       {
03146             TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_SPOTTED_BLOODCAT );                
03147       }
03148       else
03149       {
03150             if ( fVirginSector )
03151             {
03152                   // First time we've seen a guy this sector
03153                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_SEE_ENEMY_VARIATION );
03154             }
03155             else
03156             {
03157 #ifdef ENGLISH
03158                   if ( Random( 100 ) < 30 )
03159                   {
03160                         DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_ENEMY );
03161                   }
03162                   else
03163                   {
03164                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_SEE_ENEMY );
03165                   }
03166 #else
03167                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_SEE_ENEMY );
03168 #endif
03169             }
03170       }
03171 }
03172 
03173 void OurTeamSeesSomeone( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bNumReRevealed, INT8 bNumNewEnemies )
03174 {
03175       if ( gTacticalStatus.fVirginSector )
03176       {
03177             // If we are in NPC dialogue now... stop!
03178             DeleteTalkingMenu( );
03179 
03180             // Say quote!
03181             SaySeenQuote( pSoldier, gfPlayerTeamSawCreatures, TRUE, gfPlayerTeamSawJoey );
03182 
03183             HaultSoldierFromSighting( pSoldier, TRUE );
03184 
03185             // Set virgin sector to false....
03186             gTacticalStatus.fVirginSector = FALSE;
03187       }
03188       else
03189       {
03190             // if this merc is selected and he's actually moving
03191             //if ((pSoldier->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier) && !pSoldier->bStopped)
03192             // ATE: Change this to if the guy is ours....
03193             // How will this feel?
03194             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03195             {
03196                   // STOP IF WE WERE MOVING....
03197                   /// Speek up!
03198                   if ( bNumReRevealed > 0 && bNumNewEnemies == 0 )
03199                   {
03200                         DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
03201                   }
03202                   else
03203                   {
03204                         SaySeenQuote( pSoldier, gfPlayerTeamSawCreatures, FALSE, gfPlayerTeamSawJoey );
03205                   }
03206 
03207                   HaultSoldierFromSighting( pSoldier, TRUE );
03208 
03209                   if ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn )
03210                   {
03211                         // Locate to our guy, then slide to enemy
03212                         LocateSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, SETLOCATOR );
03213 
03214                         // Now slide to other guy....
03215                         SlideTo( NOWHERE, gTacticalStatus.ubEnemySightingOnTheirTurnEnemyID, NOBODY ,SETLOCATOR);                                     
03216 
03217                   }
03218 
03219                   // Unset User's turn UI
03220                   UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
03221             }
03222       }
03223 
03224       // OK, check what music mode we are in, change to battle if we're in battle
03225       // If we are in combat....
03226       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
03227       {
03228             // If we are NOT in any music mode...
03229             if ( gubMusicMode == MUSIC_NONE )
03230             {
03231                   SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_BATTLE );
03232             }
03233       }
03234 
03235 
03236 }
03237 
03238 void RadioSightings(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubAbout, UINT8 ubTeamToRadioTo )
03239 {
03240  SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent;
03241  INT32      iLoop;
03242  UINT8      start,end,revealedEnemies = 0,unknownEnemies = 0,stillUnseen=TRUE;
03243  UINT8      scrollToGuynum = NOBODY,sightedHatedOpponent = FALSE;
03244  //UINT8    oppIsCivilian;
03245  INT8       *pPersOL,*pbPublOL; //,dayQuote;
03246  BOOLEAN    fContactSeen;
03247  BOOLEAN fSawCreatureForFirstTime = FALSE;
03248 
03249 
03250 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
03251 DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
03252                    String("RADIO SIGHTINGS: for %d about %d",pSoldier->ubID,ubAbout) );
03253 #endif
03254 
03255 
03256 
03257 #ifdef RECORDNET
03258  if (!ptr->human)
03259    fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\tNPC %d(%s) radios his sightings to his team\n",ptr->guynum,ExtMen[ptr->guynum].name);
03260 #endif
03261 
03262  gTacticalStatus.Team[pSoldier->bTeam].ubLastMercToRadio = pSoldier->ubID;
03263 
03264 
03265 
03266 
03267 
03268 
03269  // who are we radioing about?
03270  if (ubAbout == EVERYBODY)
03271   {
03272    start    = 0;
03273    end            = MAXMERCS;
03274   }
03275  else
03276   {
03277    start    = ubAbout;
03278    end            = ubAbout + 1;
03279   }
03280 
03281 
03282  // hang a pointer to the start of our this guy's personal opplist
03283  pPersOL = &(pSoldier->bOppList[start]);
03284 
03285  // hang a pointer to the start of this guy's opponents in the public opplist
03286  pbPublOL = &(gbPublicOpplist[ubTeamToRadioTo][start]);
03287 
03288  pOpponent = MercPtrs[start];
03289 
03290  // loop through every one of this guy's opponents
03291  for (iLoop = start; iLoop < end; iLoop++,pOpponent++,pPersOL++,pbPublOL++)
03292   {
03293         fContactSeen = FALSE;
03294 
03295 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
03296       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
03297                    String("RS: checking %d",pOpponent->ubID) );
03298 #endif
03299 
03300 
03301    // make sure this merc is active, here & still alive (unconscious OK)
03302    if (!pOpponent->bActive || !pOpponent->bInSector || !pOpponent->bLife)
03303     {
03304 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
03305             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
03306                   String("RS: inactive/notInSector/life %d",pOpponent->ubID) );
03307 #endif
03308 
03309 
03310      continue;                          // skip to the next merc
03311     }
03312 
03313    // if these two mercs are on the same SIDE, then they're NOT opponents
03314    // NEW: Apr. 21 '96: must allow ALL non-humans to get radioed about
03315    if ((pSoldier->bSide == pOpponent->bSide) && (pOpponent->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC))
03316     {
03317 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
03318                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
03319                    String("RS: same side %d",pSoldier->bSide) );
03320 #endif
03321 
03322      continue;                          // skip to the next merc
03323     }
03324 
03325    // determine whether we think we're still unseen or if "our cover's blown"
03326    // if we know about this opponent's location for any reason
03327    if ((pOpponent->bVisible >= 0) || gbShowEnemies)
03328     {
03329      // and he can see us, then gotta figure we KNOW that he can see us
03330      if (pOpponent->bOppList[pSoldier->ubID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
03331        stillUnseen = FALSE;
03332     }
03333 
03334 
03335    // if we personally don't know a thing about this opponent
03336    if (*pPersOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN)
03337     {
03338 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
03339      //fprintf(OpplistFile,"not heard or seen\n");
03340 #endif
03341 
03342 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
03343                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
03344                    String("RS: not heard or seen") );
03345 #endif
03346 
03347      continue;                          // skip to the next opponent
03348     }
03349 
03350        // if personal knowledge is NOT more up to date and NOT the same as public
03351    if ((!gubKnowledgeValue[*pbPublOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE][*pPersOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE]) &&
03352        (*pbPublOL != *pPersOL))
03353     {
03354 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
03355      //fprintf(OpplistFile,"no new knowledge (per %d, pub %d)\n",*pPersOL,*pbPublOL);
03356 #endif
03357      
03358 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
03359                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
03360                     String("RS: no new knowledge per %d pub %d",*pPersOL,*pbPublOL) );
03361 #endif
03362 
03363              
03364              
03365              continue;                          // skip to the next opponent
03366     }
03367 
03368 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
03369    //fprintf(OpplistFile,"made it!\n");
03370 #endif
03371 
03372 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
03373             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
03374                    String("RS: made it!") );
03375 #endif
03376 
03377 
03378 
03379    // if it's our merc, and he currently sees this opponent
03380    if (PTR_OURTEAM && (*pPersOL == SEEN_CURRENTLY) && !(( pOpponent->bSide == pSoldier->bSide) || pOpponent->bNeutral))
03381    {
03382     // used by QueueDayMessage() to scroll to one of the new enemies
03383     // scroll to the last guy seen, unless we see a hated guy, then use him!
03384     if (!sightedHatedOpponent)
03385        scrollToGuynum = pOpponent->ubID;
03386 
03387     // don't care whether and how many new enemies are seen if everyone visible
03388     // and he's healthy enough to be a threat (so is worth talking about)
03389 
03390             // do the following if we're radioing to our own team; if radioing to militia
03391             // then alert them instead
03392             if ( ubTeamToRadioTo != MILITIA_TEAM )
03393             {
03394                   if (!gbShowEnemies && (pOpponent->bLife >= OKLIFE))
03395                   {
03396                         // if this enemy has not been publicly seen or heard recently
03397                         if (*pbPublOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN)
03398                   {
03399                         // chalk up another "unknown" enemy
03400                         unknownEnemies++;
03401 
03402                               fContactSeen = TRUE;
03403                               // if this enemy is hated by the merc doing the sighting
03404                         //if (MercHated(Proptr[ptr->characternum].p_bias,oppPtr->characternum))
03405                         //sightedHatedOpponent = TRUE;
03406 
03407                         // now the important part: does this enemy see him/her back?
03408                         if (pOpponent->bOppList[pSoldier->ubID] != SEEN_CURRENTLY)
03409                   {
03410                         // EXPERIENCE GAIN (10): Discovered a new enemy without being seen
03411                         StatChange(pSoldier,EXPERAMT,10,FALSE);
03412                   }
03413                         }
03414                         else
03415                   {
03416 
03417                         // if he has publicly not been seen now, or anytime during this turn
03418                         if ((*pbPublOL != SEEN_CURRENTLY) && (*pbPublOL != SEEN_THIS_TURN))
03419                               {
03420                         // chalk up another "revealed" enemy
03421                         revealedEnemies++;
03422                                     fContactSeen = TRUE;
03423                               }
03424                               else
03425                               {
03426                                     if ( MercPtrs[0]->bLife < 10 )
03427                                     {
03428                                           int i = 0;
03429                                     }
03430                               }
03431                   }
03432 
03433                         if ( fContactSeen )
03434                         {
03435                               if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03436                               {
03437                                     if ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != gbPlayerNum )
03438                                     {
03439                                           // Save some stuff!
03440                                           if (gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn)
03441                                           {
03442                                                 // this has already come up so turn OFF the pause-all-anims flag for the previous
03443                                                 // person and set it for this next person
03444                                                 MercPtrs[gTacticalStatus.ubEnemySightingOnTheirTurnEnemyID]->fPauseAllAnimation = FALSE;
03445                                           }
03446                                           else
03447                                           {
03448                                                 gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn = TRUE;
03449                                           }
03450                                           gTacticalStatus.ubEnemySightingOnTheirTurnEnemyID = pOpponent->ubID;
03451                                           gTacticalStatus.ubEnemySightingOnTheirTurnPlayerID = pSoldier->ubID;          
03452                                           gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceDemoOn = GetJA2Clock( );
03453 
03454                                           pOpponent->fPauseAllAnimation = TRUE;
03455 
03456                                     }
03457                               }
03458 
03459                               if ( pOpponent->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER )
03460                               {
03461                                     gfPlayerTeamSawCreatures = TRUE;
03462                               }
03463 
03464                               // ATE: Added for bloodcat...
03465                               if ( pOpponent->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
03466                               {
03467                                     // 2 is for bloodcat
03468                                     gfPlayerTeamSawCreatures = 2;
03469                               }
03470 
03471                         }
03472 
03473                         if ( pOpponent->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER )
03474                         {
03475                               if ( !(gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_HAVESEENCREATURE) )
03476                               {
03477                                     fSawCreatureForFirstTime = TRUE;
03478                               }
03479                         }
03480 
03481                   }
03482             }
03483             else
03484             {
03485                   // radioing to militia that we saw someone! alert them!
03486                   if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bTeamActive && !gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition )
03487                   {
03488                         HandleInitialRedAlert( MILITIA_TEAM, FALSE );
03489                   }
03490             }
03491    }  // end of our team's merc sees new opponent
03492 
03493    // IF WE'RE HERE, OUR PERSONAL INFORMATION IS AT LEAST AS UP-TO-DATE
03494    // AS THE PUBLIC KNOWLEDGE, SO WE WILL REPLACE THE PUBLIC KNOWLEDGE
03495 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
03496    fprintf(OpplistFile,"UpdatePublic (RadioSightings) for team %d about %d\n",ptr->team,oppPtr->guynum);
03497 #endif
03498 
03499 
03500 #ifdef TESTOPPLIST
03501       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2OPPLIST, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
03502                    String("...............UPDATE PUBLIC: soldier %d SEEING soldier %d",pSoldier->ubID,pOpponent->ubID) );
03503 #endif
03504 
03505 
03506 
03507    UpdatePublic(ubTeamToRadioTo,pOpponent->ubID,*pPersOL,gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID][pOpponent->ubID],gbLastKnownOppLevel[pSoldier->ubID][pOpponent->ubID]);
03508   }
03509 
03510 
03511  // if soldier heard a misc noise more important that his team's public one
03512  if (pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume > gubPublicNoiseVolume[ubTeamToRadioTo])
03513   {
03514    // replace the soldier's team's public noise with his
03515    gsPublicNoiseGridno[ubTeamToRadioTo]   = pSoldier->sNoiseGridno;
03516        gbPublicNoiseLevel[ubTeamToRadioTo]      = pSoldier->bNoiseLevel;
03517    gubPublicNoiseVolume[ubTeamToRadioTo]  = pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume;
03518   }
03519 
03520 
03521  // if this soldier is on the local team
03522   if (PTR_OURTEAM)
03523   {
03524    // don't trigger sighting quotes or stop merc's movement if everyone visible
03525    //if (!(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_ALL_MERCS))
03526     {
03527      // if we've revealed any enemies, or seen any previously unknown enemies
03528      if (revealedEnemies || unknownEnemies)
03529       {
03530                         // First check for a virgin map and set to false if we see our first guy....
03531                         // Only if this guy is an ememy!
03532 
03533                         OurTeamSeesSomeone( pSoldier, revealedEnemies, unknownEnemies );                    
03534                   }
03535                   else if (fSawCreatureForFirstTime)
03536                   {
03537                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_HAVESEENCREATURE;
03538                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_FIRSTTIME_GAME_SEE_CREATURE );                 
03539                   }
03540 
03541     }
03542   }
03543 }

04315 
04316 void AppendAttachmentCode( UINT16 usItem, UINT16 *str )
04317 {
04318       switch( usItem )
04319       {
04320             case SILENCER:
04321                   wcscat( str, L" Sil" );
04322                   break;
04323             case SNIPERSCOPE:
04324                   wcscat( str, L" Scp" );
04325                   break;
04326             case BIPOD:
04327                   wcscat( str, L" Bip" );
04328                   break;
04329             case LASERSCOPE:
04330                   wcscat( str, L" Las" );
04331                   break;
04332       }
04333 }
04334 
04335 void WriteQuantityAndAttachments( OBJECTTYPE *pObject, INT32 yp )
04336 {
04337       UINT16 szAttach[30];
04338       BOOLEAN fAttachments;
04339       //100%  Qty: 2  Attach:
04340       //100%  Qty: 2  
04341       //100%  Attach:
04342       //100%
04343       if( !pObject->usItem )
04344             return;
04345       //Build attachment string
04346       fAttachments = FALSE;
04347       if( pObject->usAttachItem[0] || pObject->usAttachItem[1] || 
04348               pObject->usAttachItem[2] || pObject->usAttachItem[3] )
04349       {
04350             fAttachments = TRUE;
04351             swprintf( szAttach, L"(" );
04352             AppendAttachmentCode( pObject->usAttachItem[0], szAttach );
04353             AppendAttachmentCode( pObject->usAttachItem[1], szAttach );
04354             AppendAttachmentCode( pObject->usAttachItem[2], szAttach );
04355             AppendAttachmentCode( pObject->usAttachItem[3], szAttach );
04356             wcscat( szAttach, L" )" );
04357       }
04358 
04359       if( Item[pObject->usItem].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
04360       { //ammo
04361             if( pObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
04362             {
04363                   UINT16 str[50];
04364                   UINT16 temp[5];
04365                   UINT8 i;
04366                   swprintf( str, L"Clips:  %d  (%d", pObject->ubNumberOfObjects, pObject->bStatus[0] );
04367                   for( i = 1; i < pObject->ubNumberOfObjects; i++ )
04368                   {
04369                         swprintf( temp, L", %d", pObject->bStatus[0] );
04370                         wcscat( str, temp );
04371                   }
04372                   wcscat( str, L")" );
04373                   gprintf( 320, yp, str ); 
04374             }
04375             else
04376                   gprintf( 320, yp, L"%d rounds", pObject->bStatus[0] );
04377             return;
04378       }
04379       if( pObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 && fAttachments )
04380       { //everything
04381             gprintf( 320, yp, L"%d%%  Qty:  %d  %s", 
04382                   pObject->bStatus[0], pObject->ubNumberOfObjects, szAttach );
04383       }
04384       else if( pObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
04385       { //condition and quantity
04386             gprintf( 320, yp, L"%d%%  Qty:  %d  ", 
04387                   pObject->bStatus[0], pObject->ubNumberOfObjects );
04388       }
04389       else if( fAttachments )
04390       { //condition and attachments
04391             gprintf( 320, yp, L"%d%%  %s", pObject->bStatus[0], szAttach );
04392       }
04393       else
04394       { //condition
04395             gprintf( 320, yp, L"%d%%", pObject->bStatus[0] );
04396       }
04397 }

04647 
04648 // 
04649 // Noise stuff
04650 //
04651 
04652 #define MAX_MOVEMENT_NOISE 9
04653 
04654 UINT8 MovementNoise( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04655 {
04656  INT32      iStealthSkill, iRoll;
04657  UINT8      ubMaxVolume, ubVolume, ubBandaged, ubEffLife;
04658  INT8       bInWater = FALSE;
04659 
04660       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
04661       {           
04662             return( (UINT8) (MAX_MOVEMENT_NOISE - PreRandom( 2 )) );
04663       }
04664 
04665       iStealthSkill = 20 + 4 * EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) + ((EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) * 4) / 10); // 24-100
04666 
04667       // big bonus for those "extra stealthy" mercs
04668       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
04669       {
04670             iStealthSkill += 50;
04671       }
04672       else if (HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, STEALTHY ))
04673       {
04674             iStealthSkill += 25 * NUM_SKILL_TRAITS( pSoldier, STEALTHY );
04675       }
04676 
04677       if ( GetWornStealth(pSoldier) > 0 )
04678             iStealthSkill += GetWornStealth(pSoldier) / 2;
04679 
04680 
04681  //NumMessage("Base Stealth = ",stealthSkill);
04682 
04683 
04684       ubBandaged = pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife - pSoldier->bBleeding;
04685       ubEffLife = pSoldier->bLife + (ubBandaged / 2);
04686 
04687  // IF "SNEAKER'S" "EFFECTIVE LIFE" IS AT LESS THAN 50
04688       if (ubEffLife < 50)
04689       {
04690             // reduce effective stealth skill by up to 50% for low life
04691             iStealthSkill -= (iStealthSkill * (50 - ubEffLife)) / 100;
04692       }
04693 
04694       // if breath is below 50%
04695       if (pSoldier->bBreath < 50)
04696       {
04697             // reduce effective stealth skill by up to 50%
04698             iStealthSkill -= (iStealthSkill * (50 - pSoldier->bBreath)) / 100;
04699       }
04700 
04701       // if sneaker is moving through water
04702       if (Water( pSoldier->sGridNo ) )
04703       {
04704             iStealthSkill -= 10; // 10% penalty
04705       }
04706       else if (DeepWater( pSoldier->sGridNo ) )
04707       {
04708             iStealthSkill -= 20; // 20% penalty
04709       }
04710 
04711       if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] )
04712       {
04713             // minus 3 percent per bonus AP from adrenaline
04714             iStealthSkill -= 3 * pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ];
04715       }
04716 
04717 /*
04718       // if sneaker is too eager and impatient to "do it right"
04719       if ((pSoldier->bTrait == OVER_ENTHUS) || (pSoldier->bAttitude == AGGRESSIVE))
04720       {
04721             ubStealthSkill -= 10;   // 10% penalty
04722       }
04723 */
04724  //NumMessage("Modified Stealth = ",stealthSkill);
04725 
04726       iStealthSkill = __max( iStealthSkill, 0 );
04727 
04728       if (!pSoldier->bStealthMode)  // REGULAR movement
04729       {
04730             ubMaxVolume = MAX_MOVEMENT_NOISE - (iStealthSkill / 16);    // 9 - (0 to 6) => 3 to 9
04731 
04732             if (bInWater)
04733             {
04734                   ubMaxVolume++;          // in water, can be even louder
04735             }
04736             switch (pSoldier->usAnimState)
04737             {
04738                   case CRAWLING:
04739                         ubMaxVolume -= 2;
04740                         break;
04741                   case SWATTING:
04742                         ubMaxVolume -= 1;
04743                         break;
04744                   case RUNNING:
04745                         ubMaxVolume += 3;
04746                         break;
04747             }
04748 
04749             if (ubMaxVolume < 2)
04750             {
04751                   ubVolume = ubMaxVolume;
04752             }
04753             else
04754             {
04755                   ubVolume = 1 + (UINT8) PreRandom(ubMaxVolume);  // actual volume is 1 to max volume
04756             }
04757       }
04758       else              // in STEALTH mode
04759       {
04760             iRoll = (INT32) PreRandom(100);     // roll them bones!
04761 
04762             if (iRoll >= iStealthSkill)   // v1.13 modification: give a second chance!
04763             {
04764                   iRoll = (INT32) PreRandom(100);
04765             }
04766 
04767             if (iRoll < iStealthSkill)
04768             {
04769                   ubVolume = 0;     // made it, stayed quiet moving through this tile
04770             }
04771             else  // OOPS!
04772             {
04773                   ubVolume = 1 + ((iRoll - iStealthSkill + 1) / 16);    // volume is 1 - 7 ... 
04774                   switch (pSoldier->usAnimState)
04775                   {
04776                         case CRAWLING:
04777                               ubVolume -= 2;
04778                               break;
04779                         case SWATTING:
04780                               ubVolume -= 1;
04781                               break;
04782                         case RUNNING:
04783                               ubVolume += 3;
04784                               break;
04785                   }
04786                   if (ubVolume < 1)
04787                   {
04788                         ubVolume = 0;
04789                   }
04790 
04791                   // randomize at which movement step the sneaking failure will happen
04792 //                Status.stepsTilNoise = Random(MAXMOVESTEPS);    // 0 - 6
04793             }
04794       }
04795 
04796       //NumMessage("Volume = ",volume);
04797 
04798       // save noise volume where stepped HandleSteppedLook can back get at it later
04799 //    Status.moveNoiseVolume = ubVolume;
04800       return( ubVolume );
04801 }
04802 
04803 UINT8 DoorOpeningNoise( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04804 {
04805       INT16                               sGridNo;
04806       DOOR_STATUS *           pDoorStatus;
04807       UINT8                               ubDoorNoise;
04808 
04809       // door being opened gridno is always the pending-action-data2 value
04810       sGridNo                             = pSoldier->sPendingActionData2;
04811       pDoorStatus = GetDoorStatus( sGridNo );
04812 
04813       if ( pDoorStatus && pDoorStatus->ubFlags & DOOR_HAS_TIN_CAN )
04814       {
04815             // double noise possible!
04816             ubDoorNoise = DOOR_NOISE_VOLUME * 3;
04817       }
04818       else
04819       {
04820             ubDoorNoise = DOOR_NOISE_VOLUME;
04821       }
04822       if ( MovementNoise( pSoldier ) )
04823       {
04824             // failed any stealth checks
04825             return( ubDoorNoise );
04826       }
04827       else
04828       {
04829             // succeeded in being stealthy!
04830             return( 0 );
04831       }           
04832 }
04833 
04834 void MakeNoise(UINT8 ubNoiseMaker, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubTerrType, UINT8 ubVolume, UINT8 ubNoiseType )
04835 {
04836       EV_S_NOISE  SNoise;
04837 
04838       SNoise.ubNoiseMaker = ubNoiseMaker;
04839       SNoise.sGridNo = sGridNo;
04840       SNoise.bLevel = bLevel;
04841       SNoise.ubTerrType = ubTerrType;
04842       SNoise.ubVolume = ubVolume;
04843       SNoise.ubNoiseType = ubNoiseType;
04844 
04845       if ( gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount )
04846       {
04847             // delay these events until the attack is over!
04848             AddGameEvent( S_NOISE, DEMAND_EVENT_DELAY, &SNoise );
04849       }
04850       else
04851       {
04852             // AddGameEvent( S_NOISE, 0, &SNoise );
04853 
04854             // now call directly
04855             OurNoise( SNoise.ubNoiseMaker, SNoise.sGridNo, SNoise.bLevel, SNoise.ubTerrType, SNoise.ubVolume, SNoise.ubNoiseType );
04856             
04857       }
04858 
04859 /*
04860       INT8 bWeControlNoise = FALSE;
04861 
04862       if (ubNoiseMode == UNEXPECTED)
04863       {
04864             bWeControlNoise = TRUE;
04865       }
04866       else  // EXPECTED noise
04867       {
04868             if (ubNoiseMaker < NOBODY)
04869             {

04871                   {
04872                         bWeControlNoise = TRUE;
04873                   }
04874             }
04875             else
04876             {
04877                   // expected noise by NOBODY is sent by LEADER, received by others
04878                   if (Net.pnum == LEADER)

04880                         bWeControlNoise = TRUE;
04881                   }
04882             }
04883       }
04884 
04885       if (bWeControlNoise)
04886       {
04887             OurNoise(ubNoiseMaker,sGridNo,ubTerrType,ubVolume,ubNoiseType,ubNoiseMode);
04888       }
04889       else
04890       {
04891             // can't be UNEXPECTED, check if it's a SEND or NO_SEND
04892             if (ubNoiseMode == EXPECTED_NOSEND)
04893             {
04894                   // no NET_NOISE message is required, trigger TheirNoise() right here
04895                   TheirNoise(ubNoiseMaker,sGridNo,ubTerrType,ubVolume,ubNoiseType,ubNoiseMode);
04896             }
04897             else
04898             {
04899 
04900                   // EXPECTED_SEND, TheirNoise() will be triggered by the arrival of the
04901                   // NET_NOISE message, not by us.  Wait here until that's all done...
04902 
04903                   // wait for the NET_NOISE to arrive (it will set noiseReceived flag)
04904                   //stopAction = TRUE;          // prevent real-time events from passing us by
04905                   MarkTime(&LoopTime);
04906                   while (Status.noiseReceived != ubNoiseType)
04907                   {
04908                         LoopTimePast = Elapsed(&LoopTime);
04909                         if (LoopTimePast > 50 && LoopTimePast < 2000)
04910                         {
04911                               KeepInterfaceGoing(19); // xxx yyy zzz experimental Aug 16/96 9:15 pm
04912                         }
04913                         else
04914                         {
04915                               KeyHitReport("MakeNoise: Waiting for NET_NOISE, need ubNoiseType ",ubNoiseType);
04916                         }
04917                         CheckForNetIncoming();
04918                   };
04919                   //stopAction = FALSE;   // re-enable real-time events
04920 
04921                   // turn off the oppChk flag again
04922                   Status.noiseReceived = -1;
04923 
04924             }
04925       }
04926 */
04927 }

04929 
04930 void OurNoise( UINT8 ubNoiseMaker, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubTerrType, UINT8 ubVolume, UINT8 ubNoiseType )
04931 {
04932       INT8 bSendNoise = FALSE;
04933       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04934 
04935 
04936 #ifdef BYPASSNOISE
04937       return;
04938 #endif
04939 
04940 
04941 #ifdef BETAVERSION
04942       sprintf(tempstr,"OurNoise: ubNoiseType = %s, ubNoiseMaker = %d, ubNoiseMode = %d, sGridNo = %d, ubVolume = %d",
04943                   NoiseTypeStr[ubNoiseType],ubNoiseMaker,ubNoiseMode,sGridNo,ubVolume);
04944 #ifdef RECORDNET
04945       fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\t%s\n",tempstr);
04946 #endif
04947 #ifdef TESTNOISE
04948       PopMessage(tempstr);
04949 #endif
04950 #endif
04951 
04952       // see if anyone actually hears this noise, sees ubNoiseMaker, etc.
04953       ProcessNoise(ubNoiseMaker, sGridNo, bLevel, ubTerrType,     ubVolume,   ubNoiseType);
04954 
04955       if ((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && (ubNoiseMaker < NOBODY) && !gfDelayResolvingBestSightingDueToDoor )
04956       {
04957             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ubNoiseMaker];
04958 
04959             // interrupts are possible, resolve them now (we're in control here)
04960             // (you can't interrupt NOBODY, even if you hear the noise)
04961 
04962             ResolveInterruptsVs(pSoldier,NOISEINTERRUPT);
04963       }
04964 
04965 }
