05030 
05031 void ProcessNoise(UINT8 ubNoiseMaker, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubTerrType, UINT8 ubBaseVolume, UINT8 ubNoiseType)
05032 {
05033       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
05034       UINT8 bLoop, bTeam;
05035       UINT8 ubLoudestEffVolume, ubEffVolume;
05036 //    UINT8 ubPlayVolume;
05037       INT8 bCheckTerrain = FALSE;
05038       UINT8 ubSourceTerrType, ubSource;
05039       INT8 bTellPlayer = FALSE, bHeard, bSeen;
05040       UINT8 ubHeardLoudestBy, ubNoiseDir, ubLoudestNoiseDir;
05041 
05042 
05043 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
05044       fprintf(OpplistFile,"PN: nType=%s, nMaker=%d, g=%d, tType=%d, bVol=%d\n",
05045             NoiseTypeStr[noiseType],ubNoiseMaker,sGridNo,ubTerrType,baseVolume);
05046 #endif
05047 
05048       // if the base volume itself was negligible
05049       if (!ubBaseVolume)
05050             return;
05051 
05052 
05053       // EXPLOSIONs are special, because they COULD be caused by a merc who is
05054       // no longer alive (but he placed the bomb or flaky grenade in the past).
05055       // Later noiseMaker gets whacked to NOBODY anyway, so that's OK.  So a
05056       // dead noiseMaker is only used here to decide WHICH soldiers HearNoise().
05057 
05058       // if noise is made by a person, AND it's not noise from an explosion
05059       if ((ubNoiseMaker < NOBODY) && (ubNoiseType != NOISE_EXPLOSION))
05060       {
05061             // inactive/not in sector/dead soldiers, shouldn't be making noise!
05062             if (!Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].bActive || !Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].bInSector ||
05063         Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD)
05064             {
05065 #ifdef BETAVERSION
05066                   NumMessage("ProcessNoise: ERROR - Noisemaker is inactive/not in sector/dead, Guy #",ubNoiseMaker);
05067 #endif
05068                   return;
05069             }
05070 
05071             // if he's out of life, and this isn't just his "dying scream" which is OK
05072             if (!Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].bLife && (ubNoiseType != NOISE_SCREAM))
05073             {
05074 #ifdef BETAVERSION
05075                   NumMessage("ProcessNoise: ERROR - Noisemaker is lifeless, Guy #",ubNoiseMaker);
05076 #endif
05077                   return;
05078             }
05079       }
05080 
05081 
05082       // DETERMINE THE TERRAIN TYPE OF THE GRIDNO WHERE NOISE IS COMING FROM
05083 
05084       ubSourceTerrType = gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubTerrainID;
05085 /*
05086       // start with the terrain type passed in to us
05087       ubSourceTerrType = ubTerrType;
05088 
05089       // if this isn't enough to get a valid terrain type
05090       if ((ubSourceTerrType < GROUNDTYPE) || (ubSourceTerrType > OCEANTYPE))
05091       {
05092             // use the source gridno of the noise itself
05093             ubSourceTerrType = TTypeList[Terrain(sGridNo)];
05094       }
05095       */
05096 
05097       // if we have now somehow obtained a valid terrain type
05098       if ((ubSourceTerrType >= FLAT_GROUND) || (ubSourceTerrType <= DEEP_WATER))
05099       {
05100             //NumMessage("Source Terrain Type = ",ubSourceTerrType);
05101             bCheckTerrain = TRUE;
05102       }
05103       // else give up trying to get terrain type, just assume sound isn't muffled
05104 
05105 
05106       // DETERMINE THE *PERCEIVED* SOURCE OF THE NOISE
05107       switch (ubNoiseType)
05108       {
05109             // for noise generated by an OBJECT shot/thrown/dropped by the noiseMaker
05110             case NOISE_ROCK_IMPACT:
05111                   gsWhoThrewRock = ubNoiseMaker;
05112                   //fall through here!!!
05113             case NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT:
05114             case NOISE_GRENADE_IMPACT:
05115             case NOISE_EXPLOSION:
05116                   // the source of the noise is not at all obvious, so hide it from
05117                   // the listener and maintain noiseMaker's cover by making source NOBODY
05118                   ubSource = NOBODY;
05119                   break;
05120 
05121             default:
05122                   // normal situation: the noiseMaker is obviously the source of the noise
05123                   ubSource = ubNoiseMaker;
05124                   break;
05125       }
05126 
05127       // LOOP THROUGH EACH TEAM
05128       for (bTeam = 0; bTeam < MAXTEAMS; bTeam++)
05129       {
05130             // skip any inactive teams
05131             if (!gTacticalStatus.Team[bTeam].bTeamActive)
05132             {
05133                   continue;
05134             }
05135 
05136             // if a the noise maker is a person, not just NOBODY
05137             if (ubNoiseMaker < NOBODY)
05138             {
05139                   // if this team is the same TEAM as the noise maker's
05140                   // (for now, assume we will report noises by unknown source on same SIDE)
05141                   // OR, if the noise maker is currently in sight to this HUMAN team
05142 
05143                   // CJC: changed to if the side is the same side as the noise maker's!
05144                   // CJC: changed back!
05145 
05146                   if (bTeam == Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].bTeam)
05147                   {
05148                         continue;
05149                   }
05150                   
05151                   if (gTacticalStatus.Team[bTeam].bHuman)
05152                   {
05153                         if (gbPublicOpplist[bTeam][ubNoiseMaker] == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
05154                         {
05155                               continue;
05156                         }
05157                   }
05158             }
05159 
05160 #ifdef REPORTTHEIRNOISE
05161             // if this is any team
05162             if (TRUE)
05163 #else
05164             // if this is our team
05165             if (TRUE)
05166             //if (bTeam == Net.pnum)
05167 #endif
05168             {
05169                   // tell player about noise if enemies are present
05170                   bTellPlayer = gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector && ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) || (gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam) );
05171 
05172 #ifndef TESTNOISE
05173                   switch (ubNoiseType)
05174                   {
05175                         case NOISE_GUNFIRE:
05176                         case NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT:
05177                         case NOISE_ROCK_IMPACT:
05178                         case NOISE_GRENADE_IMPACT:
05179                               // It's noise caused by a projectile.  If the projectile was seen by
05180                               // the local player while in flight (PublicBullet), then don't bother
05181                               // giving him a message about the noise it made, he's obviously aware.
05182                               if (1 /*PublicBullet*/)
05183                               {                             
05184                                     bTellPlayer = FALSE;
05185                               }
05186 
05187                               break;
05188 
05189                         case NOISE_EXPLOSION:
05190                               // if center of explosion is in visual range of team, don't report
05191                               // noise, because the player is already watching the thing go BOOM!
05192                               if (TeamMemberNear(bTeam,sGridNo,STRAIGHT))
05193                               {
05194                                     bTellPlayer = FALSE;
05195                               }
05196                               break;
05197 
05198                         case NOISE_SILENT_ALARM:
05199                               bTellPlayer = FALSE;
05200                               break;
05201                   }
05202 
05203                   // if noise was made by a person
05204                   if (ubNoiseMaker < NOBODY)
05205                   {
05206                         // if noisemaker has been *PUBLICLY* SEEN OR HEARD during THIS TURN
05207                         if ((gbPublicOpplist[bTeam][ubNoiseMaker] == SEEN_CURRENTLY) || // seen now
05208                               (gbPublicOpplist[bTeam][ubNoiseMaker] == SEEN_THIS_TURN) || // seen this turn
05209                               (gbPublicOpplist[bTeam][ubNoiseMaker] == HEARD_THIS_TURN))  // heard this turn
05210                         {
05211                               // then don't bother reporting any noise made by him to the player
05212                               bTellPlayer = FALSE;
05213                         }
05214                         /*
05215                         else if ( (Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].bVisible == TRUE) && (bTeam == gbPlayerNum) )
05216                         {
05217                               ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Handling noise from person not currently seen in player's public opplist" );
05218                         }
05219                         */
05220 
05221                         if ( MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->bLife == 0 )
05222                         {
05223                               // this guy is dead (just dying) so don't report to player
05224                               bTellPlayer = FALSE;
05225                         }
05226 
05227                   }
05228             }
05229 #endif
05230 
05231             // refresh flags for this new team
05232             bHeard = FALSE;
05233             bSeen = FALSE;
05234             ubLoudestEffVolume = 0;
05235             ubHeardLoudestBy = NOBODY;
05236 
05237             // All mercs on this team check if they are eligible to hear this noise
05238             for (bLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[bTeam].bFirstID,pSoldier = Menptr + bLoop; bLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[bTeam].bLastID; bLoop++,pSoldier++)
05239             {
05240                   // if this "listener" is inactive, or in no condition to care
05241                   if (!pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector || pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD || (pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE) || pSoldier->ubBodyType == LARVAE_MONSTER)
05242                   {
05243                         continue;          // skip him!
05244                   }
05245 
05246                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE && pSoldier->bTeam == OUR_TEAM  )
05247                   {
05248                         continue; // skip
05249                   }
05250 
05251                   if ( bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
05252                   {
05253                         // POWs should not be processed for noise
05254                         continue;
05255                   }
05256 
05257                   // if a the noise maker is a person, not just NOBODY
05258                   if (ubNoiseMaker < NOBODY)
05259                   {
05260                         // if this listener can see this noise maker
05261                         if (pSoldier->bOppList[ubNoiseMaker] == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
05262                         {
05263                               // civilians care about gunshots even if they come from someone they can see
05264                               if ( !( pSoldier->bNeutral && ubNoiseType == NOISE_GUNFIRE ) )
05265                               {
05266                                     continue;        // then who cares whether he can also hear the guy?
05267                               }
05268                         }
05269 
05270                         // screen out allied militia from hearing us
05271                         switch( MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->bTeam )
05272                         {
05273                               case OUR_TEAM:
05274                                     // if the listener is militia and still on our side, ignore noise from us
05275                                     if ( pSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM && pSoldier->bSide == 0 )
05276                                     {
05277                                           continue;
05278                                     }
05279                                     break;
05280                               case ENEMY_TEAM:
05281                                     switch( pSoldier->ubProfile )
05282                                     {
05283                                           case WARDEN:
05284                                           case GENERAL:
05285                                           case SERGEANT:
05286                                           case CONRAD:
05287                                                 // ignore soldier team
05288                                                 continue;
05289                                           default:
05290                                                 break;
05291                                     }
05292                                     break;
05293                               case MILITIA_TEAM:
05294                                     // if the noisemaker is militia and still on our side, ignore noise if we're listening
05295                                     if ( pSoldier->bTeam == OUR_TEAM && MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->bSide == 0 )
05296                                     {
05297                                           continue;
05298                                     }
05299                                     break;
05300                         }
05301 
05302                         if ( gWorldSectorX == 5 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_N )
05303                         {
05304                               // in the bloodcat arena sector, skip noises between army & bloodcats
05305                               if ( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM && MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM )
05306                               {
05307                                     continue;
05308                               }
05309                               if ( pSoldier->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM && MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
05310                               {
05311                                     continue;
05312                               }
05313                         }
05314 
05315 
05316                   }
05317                   else
05318                   {
05319                         // screen out allied militia from hearing us
05320                         if ( (ubNoiseMaker == NOBODY) && pSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM && pSoldier->bSide == 0 )
05321                         {
05322                               continue;
05323                         }
05324                   }
05325 
05326                   if ( (pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM) && (ubNoiseType == NOISE_GUNFIRE || ubNoiseType == NOISE_EXPLOSION) )
05327                   {
05328                         pSoldier->ubMiscSoldierFlags |= SOLDIER_MISC_HEARD_GUNSHOT;
05329                   }
05330 
05331                   // Can the listener hear noise of that volume given his circumstances?
05332                   ubEffVolume = CalcEffVolume(pSoldier,sGridNo,bLevel,ubNoiseType,ubBaseVolume,bCheckTerrain,pSoldier->bOverTerrainType,ubSourceTerrType);
05333 
05334 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
05335                   fprintf(OpplistFile,"PN: guy %d - effVol=%d,chkTer=%d,pSoldier->tType=%d,srcTType=%d\n",
05336                  bLoop,effVolume,bCheckTerrain,pSoldier->terrtype,ubSourceTerrType);
05337 #endif
05338 
05339 
05340                   if (ubEffVolume > 0)
05341                   {
05342                         // ALL RIGHT!  Passed all the tests, this listener hears this noise!!!
05343                         HearNoise(pSoldier,ubSource,sGridNo,bLevel,ubEffVolume,ubNoiseType, (UINT8 *)&bSeen);
05344 
05345                         bHeard = TRUE;
05346 
05347                         ubNoiseDir = atan8(CenterX(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterY(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterX(sGridNo),CenterY(sGridNo));
05348 
05349                         // check the 'noise heard & reported' bit for that soldier & direction
05350                         if ( ubNoiseType != NOISE_MOVEMENT || bTeam != OUR_TEAM || (pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts != NO_INTERRUPT) || !(pSoldier->ubMovementNoiseHeard & (1 << ubNoiseDir) ) )
05351                         {
05352                               if (ubEffVolume > ubLoudestEffVolume)
05353                               {
05354                                     ubLoudestEffVolume = ubEffVolume;
05355                                     ubHeardLoudestBy = pSoldier->ubID;
05356                                     ubLoudestNoiseDir = ubNoiseDir;
05357                               }
05358                         }
05359 
05360                   }
05361                   else
05362                   {
05363        //NameMessage(pSoldier," can't hear this noise",2500);
05364                    ubEffVolume = 0;
05365                   }
05366             }
05367 
05368 
05369             // if the noise was heard at all
05370             if (bHeard)
05371             {
05372                   // and we're doing our team
05373                   if (bTeam == OUR_TEAM)
05374                   /*
05375                   if (team == Net.pnum)
05376                   */
05377                   {
05378                         // if we are to tell the player about this type of noise
05379                         if (bTellPlayer && ubHeardLoudestBy != NOBODY )
05380                         {
05381                               // the merc that heard it the LOUDEST is the one to comment
05382                               // should add level to this function call
05383                               TellPlayerAboutNoise(MercPtrs[ubHeardLoudestBy],ubNoiseMaker,sGridNo,bLevel,ubLoudestEffVolume,ubNoiseType, ubLoudestNoiseDir);
05384 
05385                               if ( ubNoiseType == NOISE_MOVEMENT)
05386                               {
05387                                     MercPtrs[ ubHeardLoudestBy ]->ubMovementNoiseHeard |= (1 << ubNoiseDir);                                    
05388                               }
05389 
05390                         }
05391                         //if ( !(pSoldier->ubMovementNoiseHeard & (1 << ubNoiseDir) ) )
05392                   }
05393 #ifdef REPORTTHEIRNOISE
05394                   else   // debugging: report noise heard by other team's soldiers
05395                   {
05396                         if (bTellPlayer)
05397                         {
05398                               TellPlayerAboutNoise(MercPtrs[ubHeardLoudestBy],ubNoiseMaker,sGridNo,bLevel,ubLoudestEffVolume,ubNoiseType, ubLoudestNoiseDir);
05399                         }
05400                   }
05401 #endif
05402             }
05403 
05404             // if the listening team is human-controlled AND
05405             // the noise's source is another soldier
05406             // (computer-controlled teams don't radio or automatically report NOISE)
05407             if (gTacticalStatus.Team[bTeam].bHuman && (ubSource < NOBODY))
05408             {
05409                   // if ubNoiseMaker was seen by at least one member of this team
05410                   if (bSeen)
05411                   {
05412 // Temporary for opplist synching - disable random order radioing
05413 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
05414                         // insure all machines radio in synch to keep logs the same
05415                         for (bLoop = Status.team[team].guystart,pSoldier = Menptr + bLoop; bLoop < Status.team[team].guyend; bLoop++,pSoldier++)
05416                         {
05417                               // if this merc is active, in this sector, and well enough to look
05418                               if (pSoldier->active && pSoldier->in_sector && (pSoldier->life >= OKLIFE))
05419                               {
05420                                     RadioSightings(pSoldier,ubSource);
05421                                     pSoldier->newOppCnt = 0;
05422                               }
05423                         }
05424 #else
05425                         // if this human team is OURS
05426                         if (1 /* bTeam == Net.pnum */)
05427                         {
05428                               // this team is now allowed to report sightings and set Public flags
05429                               OurTeamRadiosRandomlyAbout(ubSource);
05430                         }
05431                         else  // noise was heard by another human-controlled team (not ours)
05432                         {
05433                               // mark noise maker as being seen currently
05434                               //UpdatePublic(bTeam,ubSource,SEEN_CURRENTLY,sGridNo,NOUPDATE,ACTUAL);
05435                               UpdatePublic(bTeam,ubSource,SEEN_CURRENTLY,sGridNo,bLevel);
05436                         }
05437 #endif
05438                   }
05439                   else // not seen
05440                   {
05441                         if (bHeard)
05442                         {
05443 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
05444                               fprintf(OpplistFile,"UpdatePublic (ProcessNoise/heard) for team %d about %d\n",team,ubSource);
05445 #endif
05446 
05447                               // mark noise maker as having been PUBLICLY heard THIS TURN
05448                               //UpdatePublic(team,ubSource,HEARD_THIS_TURN,sGridNo,NOUPDATE,ACTUAL);
05449                               UpdatePublic(bTeam,ubSource,HEARD_THIS_TURN,sGridNo,bLevel);
05450                         }
05451                   }
05452             }
05453       }
05454 
05455       gsWhoThrewRock = NOBODY;
05456 }
05457 
05458 
05459 
05460 UINT8 CalcEffVolume(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubNoiseType, UINT8 ubBaseVolume,
05461                   UINT8 bCheckTerrain, UINT8 ubTerrType1, UINT8 ubTerrType2)
05462 {
05463       INT32 iEffVolume, iDistance;
05464 
05465       // Lesh: deafness
05466       if ( pSoldier->bDeafenedCounter > 0 )
05467       {
05468             return( 0 );
05469       }
05470 
05471       if ( FindWalkman(pSoldier) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND  )
05472       {
05473             return( 0 );
05474       }
05475 
05476       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
05477       {
05478             // ATE: Funny things happen to ABC stuff if bNewSituation set....
05479             if ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == pSoldier->bTeam )
05480             {
05481                   return( 0 );
05482             }
05483       }
05484 
05485       //sprintf(tempstr,"CalcEffVolume BY %s for gridno %d, baseVolume = %d",pSoldier->name,gridno,baseVolume);
05486       //PopMessage(tempstr);
05487 
05488       // adjust default noise volume by listener's hearing capability
05489       iEffVolume = (INT32) ubBaseVolume + (INT32) DecideHearing( pSoldier );
05490       
05491 
05492       // effective volume reduced by listener's number of opponents in sight
05493       iEffVolume -= pSoldier->bOppCnt;
05494 
05495 
05496  // calculate the distance (in adjusted pixels) between the source of the
05497  // noise (gridno) and the location of the would-be listener (pSoldier->gridno)
05498  iDistance = (INT32) PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo );
05499  /*
05500  distance = AdjPixelsAway(pSoldier->x,pSoldier->y,CenterX(sGridNo),CenterY(sGridNo));
05501 
05502       distance /= 15;      // divide by 15 to convert from adj. pixels to tiles
05503       */
05504       //NumMessage("Distance = ",distance);
05505 
05506  // effective volume fades over distance beyond 1 tile away
05507  iEffVolume -= (iDistance - 1);
05508 
05509       /*
05510       if (pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM && pSoldier->ubBodyType != CROW )
05511       {
05512             if (pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == 0 && pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE)
05513             {
05514                   // nameless civs reduce effective volume by 2 for gunshots etc
05515                   // (double the reduction due to distance)
05516                   // so that they don't cower from attacks that are really far away
05517                   switch (ubNoiseType)
05518                   {
05519                         case NOISE_GUNFIRE:
05520                         case NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT:
05521                         case NOISE_GRENADE_IMPACT:
05522                         case NOISE_EXPLOSION:
05523                               iEffVolume -= iDistance;
05524                               break;
05525                         default:
05526                               break;
05527                   }
05528             }
05529             else if (pSoldier->bNeutral)
05530             {
05531                   // NPCs and people in groups ignore attack noises unless they are no longer neutral
05532                   switch (ubNoiseType)
05533                   {
05534                         case NOISE_GUNFIRE:
05535                         case NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT:
05536                         case NOISE_GRENADE_IMPACT:
05537                         case NOISE_EXPLOSION:
05538                               iEffVolume = 0;
05539                               break;
05540                         default:
05541                               break;
05542                   }
05543             }
05544       }
05545       */
05546 
05547       if (pSoldier->usAnimState == RUNNING)
05548       {
05549             iEffVolume -= 5;
05550       }
05551 
05552  if (pSoldier->bAssignment == SLEEPING )
05553  {
05554       // decrease effective volume since we're asleep!
05555        iEffVolume -= 5;
05556  }
05557 
05558       // check for floor/roof difference
05559       if (bLevel > pSoldier->bLevel)
05560       {
05561             // sound is amplified by roof
05562             iEffVolume += 5;
05563       }
05564       else if (bLevel < pSoldier->bLevel)
05565       {
05566             // sound is muffled
05567             iEffVolume -= 5;
05568       }
05569 
05570       // if we still have a chance of hearing this, and the terrain types are known
05571       if (iEffVolume > 0)
05572       {
05573             if (bCheckTerrain)
05574             {
05575                   // if, between noise and listener, one is outside and one is inside
05576 
05577                   // NOTE: This is a pretty dumb way of doing things, since it won't detect
05578                   // the presence of walls between 2 spots both inside or both outside, but
05579                   // given our current system it's the best that we can do
05580 
05581                   if (((ubTerrType1 == FLAT_FLOOR) && (ubTerrType2 != FLAT_FLOOR)) ||
05582                         ((ubTerrType1 != FLAT_FLOOR) && (ubTerrType2 == FLAT_FLOOR)))
05583                   {
05584                         //PopMessage("Sound is muffled by wall(s)");
05585 
05586                         // sound is muffled, reduce the effective volume of the noise
05587                         iEffVolume -= 5;
05588                   }
05589             }
05590 
05591       }
05592 
05593       //NumMessage("effVolume = ",ubEffVolume);
05594       if (iEffVolume > 0)
05595       {
05596             return( (UINT8) iEffVolume );
05597       }
05598       else
05599       {
05600             return( 0 );
05601       }
05602 }

05605 
05606 
05607 void HearNoise(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubNoiseMaker, UINT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubVolume,
05608             UINT8 ubNoiseType, UINT8 *ubSeen)
05609 {
05610       INT16       sNoiseX, sNoiseY;
05611       INT8        bHadToTurn = FALSE, bSourceSeen = FALSE;
05612       INT8        bOldOpplist;
05613       INT16       sDistVisible;
05614       INT8        bDirection;
05615       BOOLEAN fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
05616 
05617 //    DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "%d hears noise from %d (%d/%d) volume %d", pSoldier->ubID, ubNoiseMaker, sGridNo, bLevel, ubVolume ) );
05618 
05619 
05620       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
05621       {
05622             CrowsFlyAway( pSoldier->bTeam );
05623             return;
05624       }
05625 
05626       // "Turn head" towards the source of the noise and try to see what's there
05627 
05628       // don't use DistanceVisible here, but use maximum visibility distance
05629       // in as straight line instead.  Represents guy "turning just his head"
05630 
05631       // CJC 97/10: CHANGE!  Since STRAIGHT can not reliably be used as a 
05632       // max sighting distance (varies based on realtime/turnbased), call
05633       // the function with the new DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT define
05634 
05635       // is he close enough to see that gridno if he turns his head?
05636 
05637       // ignore muzzle flashes when turning head to see noise
05638       if ( ubNoiseType == NOISE_GUNFIRE && ubNoiseMaker != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->fMuzzleFlash )
05639       {
05640             sNoiseX = CenterX(sGridNo);
05641             sNoiseY = CenterY(sGridNo);
05642             bDirection = atan8(pSoldier->sX,pSoldier->sY,sNoiseX,sNoiseY);
05643             if ( pSoldier->bDirection != bDirection && pSoldier->bDirection != gOneCDirection[ bDirection ] && pSoldier->bDirection != gOneCCDirection[ bDirection ] )
05644             {
05645                   // temporarily turn off muzzle flash so DistanceVisible can be calculated without it
05646                   MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
05647                   fMuzzleFlash = TRUE;
05648             }
05649       }
05650       
05651     sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, (SoldierHasLimitedVision(pSoldier) ? pSoldier->bDesiredDirection : DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT), DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, sGridNo, bLevel, pSoldier );
05652 
05653       if ( fMuzzleFlash )
05654       {
05655             // turn flash on again
05656             MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->fMuzzleFlash = TRUE;
05657       }
05658             
05659       if (PythSpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,sGridNo) <= sDistVisible )
05660       {
05661             // just use the XXadjustedXX center of the gridno
05662             sNoiseX = CenterX(sGridNo);
05663             sNoiseY = CenterY(sGridNo);
05664 
05665             if (pSoldier->bDirection != atan8(pSoldier->sX,pSoldier->sY,sNoiseX,sNoiseY))
05666             {
05667                   bHadToTurn = TRUE;
05668             }
05669             else
05670             {
05671                   bHadToTurn = FALSE;
05672             }
05673 
05674             // and we can trace a line of sight to his x,y coordinates?
05675             // (taking into account we are definitely aware of this guy now)
05676 
05677             // skip LOS check if we had to turn and we're a tank.  sorry Mr Tank, no looking out of the sides for you!
05678             if ( !( bHadToTurn && TANK( pSoldier ) ) )
05679             {
05680                   if ( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sGridNo, bLevel, 0, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
05681                   {
05682                         // he can actually see the spot where the noise came from!
05683                         bSourceSeen = TRUE;
05684 
05685                         // if this sounds like a door opening/closing (could also be a crate)
05686                         if (ubNoiseType == NOISE_CREAKING)
05687                         {
05688                               // then look around and update ALL doors that have secretly changed
05689                               //LookForDoors(pSoldier,AWARE);
05690                         }
05691                   }
05692             }
05693 
05694 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
05695             fprintf(OpplistFile,"HN: %s by %2d(g%4d,x%3d,y%3d) at %2d(g%4d,x%3d,y%3d), hTT=%d\n",
05696                   (bSourceSeen) ? "SCS" : "FLR",
05697                   pSoldier->guynum,pSoldier->sGridNo,pSoldier->sX,pSoldier->sY,
05698                   ubNoiseMaker,sGridNo,sNoiseX,sNoiseY,
05699                   bHadToTurn);
05700 #endif
05701       }
05702 
05703       // if noise is made by a person
05704       if (ubNoiseMaker < NOBODY)
05705       {
05706             bOldOpplist = pSoldier->bOppList[ubNoiseMaker];
05707 
05708             // WE ALREADY KNOW THAT HE'S ON ANOTHER TEAM, AND HE'S NOT BEING SEEN
05709             // ProcessNoise() ALREADY DID THAT WORK FOR US
05710 
05711             if (bSourceSeen)
05712             {
05713                   ManSeesMan(pSoldier,MercPtrs[ubNoiseMaker],Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].sGridNo,Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].bLevel,HEARNOISE,CALLER_UNKNOWN);
05714 
05715                   // if it's an AI soldier, he is not allowed to automatically radio any
05716                   // noise heard, but manSeesMan has set his newOppCnt, so clear it here
05717                   if (!(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC))
05718                   {
05719                         pSoldier->bNewOppCnt = 0;
05720                   }
05721 
05722                   *ubSeen = TRUE;
05723                   // RadioSightings() must only be called later on by ProcessNoise() itself
05724                   // because we want the soldier who heard noise the LOUDEST to report it
05725 
05726                   if ( pSoldier->bNeutral )
05727                   {
05728                         // could be a civilian watching us shoot at an enemy
05729                         if (((ubNoiseType == NOISE_GUNFIRE) || (ubNoiseType == NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT)) && (ubVolume >= 3))
05730                         {
05731                               // if status is only GREEN or YELLOW
05732                               if (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED)
05733                               {
05734                                     // then this soldier goes to status RED, has proof of enemy presence
05735                                     pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
05736                                     CheckForChangingOrders(pSoldier);
05737                               }
05738                         }
05739                   }
05740 
05741             }
05742             else         // noise maker still can't be seen
05743             {
05744                   SetNewSituation( pSoldier ); // re-evaluate situation
05745 
05746                   // if noise type was unmistakably that of gunfire
05747                   if (((ubNoiseType == NOISE_GUNFIRE) || (ubNoiseType == NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT)) && (ubVolume >= 3))
05748                   {
05749                         // if status is only GREEN or YELLOW
05750                         if (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED)
05751                         {
05752                               // then this soldier goes to status RED, has proof of enemy presence
05753                               pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
05754                               CheckForChangingOrders(pSoldier);
05755                         }
05756                   }
05757 
05758                   // remember that the soldier has been heard and his new location
05759                   UpdatePersonal(pSoldier,ubNoiseMaker,HEARD_THIS_TURN,sGridNo, bLevel);
05760 
05761                   // Public info is not set unless EVERYONE on the team fails to see the
05762                   // ubnoisemaker, leaving the 'seen' flag FALSE.  See ProcessNoise().
05763 
05764                   // CJC: set the noise gridno for the soldier, if appropriate - this is what is looked at by the AI!
05765                   if (ubVolume >= pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume)
05766                   {
05767                         // yes it is, so remember this noise INSTEAD (old noise is forgotten)
05768                         pSoldier->sNoiseGridno = sGridNo;
05769                         pSoldier->bNoiseLevel = bLevel;
05770 
05771                         // no matter how loud noise was, don't remember it for than 12 turns!
05772                         if (ubVolume < MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION)
05773                         {
05774                               pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = ubVolume;
05775                         }
05776                         else
05777                         {
05778                               pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION;
05779                         }
05780 
05781                         SetNewSituation( pSoldier );  // force a fresh AI decision to be made
05782                   }
05783 
05784             }
05785 
05786             if ( pSoldier->fAIFlags & AI_ASLEEP )
05787             {                       
05788                   switch( ubNoiseType )
05789                   {
05790                         case NOISE_BULLET_IMPACT:
05791                         case NOISE_GUNFIRE:
05792                         case NOISE_EXPLOSION:
05793                         case NOISE_SCREAM:
05794                         case NOISE_WINDOW_SMASHING:
05795                         case NOISE_DOOR_SMASHING:
05796                               // WAKE UP!
05797                               pSoldier->fAIFlags &= (~AI_ASLEEP);
05798                               break;
05799                         default:
05800                               break;
05801                   }
05802             }
05803 
05804             // FIRST REQUIRE MUTUAL HOSTILES!
05805             if (!CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ], pSoldier ) && !CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ] ) && (pSoldier->bSide != MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->bSide))
05806             {
05807                   // regardless of whether the noisemaker (who's not NOBODY) was seen or not,
05808                   // as long as listener meets minimum interrupt conditions
05809                   if ( gfDelayResolvingBestSightingDueToDoor)
05810                   {                        
05811                         if ( bSourceSeen && (!( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) || (gubSightFlags & SIGHTINTERRUPT && StandardInterruptConditionsMet(pSoldier,ubNoiseMaker,bOldOpplist)) ) )
05812                         {
05813                               // we should be adding this to the array for the AllTeamLookForAll to handle                    
05814                               // since this is a door opening noise, add a bonus equal to half the door volume
05815                               UINT8 ubPoints;
05816 
05817                               ubPoints = CalcInterruptDuelPts( pSoldier, ubNoiseMaker, TRUE );
05818                               if ( ubPoints != NO_INTERRUPT )
05819                               {
05820                                     // require the enemy not to be dying if we are the sighter; in other words,
05821                                     // always add for AI guys, and always add for people with life >= OKLIFE
05822                                     if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum || MercPtrs[ ubNoiseMaker ]->bLife >= OKLIFE )
05823                                     {
05824                                           ReevaluateBestSightingPosition( pSoldier, (UINT8) (ubPoints + (ubVolume / 2)) );
05825                                     }
05826                               }
05827                         }
05828                   }
05829                   else
05830                   {
05831                         if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
05832                         {
05833                               if (StandardInterruptConditionsMet(pSoldier,ubNoiseMaker,bOldOpplist))
05834                               {
05835                                     // he gets a chance to interrupt the noisemaker
05836                                     pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts = CalcInterruptDuelPts(pSoldier,ubNoiseMaker, TRUE );
05837                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Calculating int duel pts in noise code, %d has %d points", pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts ) );
05838                               }
05839                               else
05840                               {
05841                                     pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts = NO_INTERRUPT;
05842                               }
05843                         }
05844                         else if ( bSourceSeen )
05845                         {
05846                               // seen source, in realtime, so check for sighting stuff
05847                               HandleBestSightingPositionInRealtime();
05848                         }
05849                   }
05850 
05851             }
05852       }
05853       else   // noise made by NOBODY
05854       {
05855             // if noise type was unmistakably that of an explosion (seen or not) or alarm
05856             if (!(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC))
05857             {
05858                   if ( ( ubNoiseType == NOISE_EXPLOSION || ubNoiseType == NOISE_SILENT_ALARM ) && (ubVolume >= 3) )
05859                   {
05860                         if ( ubNoiseType == NOISE_SILENT_ALARM )
05861                         {
05862                               WearGasMaskIfAvailable( pSoldier );
05863                         }
05864                         // if status is only GREEN or YELLOW
05865                         if (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED)
05866                         {
05867                               // then this soldier goes to status RED, has proof of enemy presence
05868                               pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
05869                               CheckForChangingOrders(pSoldier);
05870                         }
05871                   }
05872             }
05873             // if the source of the noise can't be seen,
05874             // OR if it's a rock and the listener had to turn so that by the time he
05875             // looked all his saw was a bunch of rocks lying still
05876             if (!bSourceSeen || ((ubNoiseType == NOISE_ROCK_IMPACT) && (bHadToTurn) ) || ubNoiseType == NOISE_SILENT_ALARM )
05877             {
05878                   // check if the effective volume of this new noise is greater than or at
05879                   // least equal to the volume of the currently noticed noise stored
05880                   if (ubVolume >= pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume)
05881                   {
05882                         // yes it is, so remember this noise INSTEAD (old noise is forgotten)
05883                         pSoldier->sNoiseGridno = sGridNo;
05884                         pSoldier->bNoiseLevel = bLevel;
05885 
05886                         // no matter how loud noise was, don't remember it for than 12 turns!
05887                         if (ubVolume < MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION)
05888                         {
05889                               pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = ubVolume;
05890                         }
05891                         else
05892                         {
05893                               pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION;
05894                         }
05895 
05896                         SetNewSituation( pSoldier );  // force a fresh AI decision to be made
05897                   }
05898             }
05899             else
05900             // if listener sees the source of the noise, AND it's either a grenade,
05901             //  or it's a rock that he watched land (didn't need to turn)
05902             {
05903                   SetNewSituation( pSoldier );  // re-evaluate situation
05904 
05905                   // if status is only GREEN or YELLOW
05906                   if (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED)
05907                   {
05908                         // then this soldier goes to status RED, has proof of enemy presence
05909                         pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
05910                         CheckForChangingOrders(pSoldier);
05911                   }
05912             }
05913 
05914             if ( gubBestToMakeSightingSize == BEST_SIGHTING_ARRAY_SIZE_INCOMBAT )
05915             {
05916                   // if the noise heard was the fall of a rock
05917                   if ((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ubNoiseType == NOISE_ROCK_IMPACT )
05918                   {
05919                         // give every ELIGIBLE listener an automatic interrupt, since it's
05920                         // reasonable to assume the guy throwing wants to wait for their reaction!
05921                         if (StandardInterruptConditionsMet(pSoldier,NOBODY,FALSE))
05922                         {
05923                               pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts = AUTOMATIC_INTERRUPT;          // force automatic interrupt
05924                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Calculating int duel pts in noise code, %d has %d points", pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts ) );
05925                         }
05926                         else
05927                         {
05928                               pSoldier->bInterruptDuelPts = NO_INTERRUPT;
05929                         }
05930                   }
05931             }
05932       }
05933 }
05934 
05935 void TellPlayerAboutNoise( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubNoiseMaker, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubVolume, UINT8 ubNoiseType, UINT8 ubNoiseDir )
05936 {
05937       UINT8 ubVolumeIndex;
05938 
05939       // CJC: tweaked the noise categories upwards a bit because our movement noises can be louder now.
05940       if (ubVolume < 4)
05941       {
05942             ubVolumeIndex = 0;            // 1-3: faint noise
05943       }
05944       else if (ubVolume < 8)  // 4-7: definite noise
05945       {
05946             ubVolumeIndex = 1;
05947       }           
05948       else if (ubVolume < 12) // 8-11: loud noise
05949       {
05950             ubVolumeIndex = 2;            
05951       }
05952       else                                                        // 12+: very loud noise
05953       {
05954             ubVolumeIndex = 3;
05955       }
05956 
05957       // display a message about a noise...
05958       // e.g. Sidney hears a loud splash from/to? the north.
05959 
05960       if ( ubNoiseMaker != NOBODY && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bTeam == Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].bTeam )
05961       {
05962             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
05963                   ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"ERROR! TAKE SCREEN CAPTURE AND TELL CAMFIELD NOW!" );
05964                   ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"%s (%d) heard noise from %s (%d), noise at %dL%d, type %d", pSoldier->name, pSoldier->ubID, Menptr[ubNoiseMaker].name, ubNoiseMaker, sGridNo, bLevel, ubNoiseType );
05965             #endif
05966       }
05967 
05968       if ( bLevel == pSoldier->bLevel || ubNoiseType == NOISE_EXPLOSION || ubNoiseType == NOISE_SCREAM || ubNoiseType == NOISE_ROCK_IMPACT || ubNoiseType == NOISE_GRENADE_IMPACT )
05969       {
05970             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pNewNoiseStr[ubNoiseType], pSoldier->name, pNoiseVolStr[ubVolumeIndex], pDirectionStr[ubNoiseDir] );
05971       }
05972       else if ( bLevel > pSoldier->bLevel )
05973       {
05974             // from above!
05975             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pNewNoiseStr[ubNoiseType], pSoldier->name, pNoiseVolStr[ubVolumeIndex], gzLateLocalizedString[6] );
05976       }
05977       else
05978       {
05979             // from below!
05980             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pNewNoiseStr[ubNoiseType], pSoldier->name, pNoiseVolStr[ubVolumeIndex], gzLateLocalizedString[7] );
05981       }
05982 
05983       // if the quote was faint, say something
05984       if (ubVolumeIndex == 0)
05985       {
05986             if ( !AreInMeanwhile( ) && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV) && pSoldier->ubTurnsUntilCanSayHeardNoise == 0)
05987             {
05988                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_HEARD_SOMETHING );
05989                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
05990                   {
05991                         pSoldier->ubTurnsUntilCanSayHeardNoise = 2;
05992                   }
05993                   else
05994                   {
05995                         pSoldier->ubTurnsUntilCanSayHeardNoise = 5;
05996                   }
05997             }
05998       }
05999 
06000       
06001       //DIGICRAB: Loud Sound Locator
06002       //show a locator for very loud noises if we are in PLATINUM mode and have an extended ear
06003       //Madd: if(gGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_PLATINUM && ubVolumeIndex >= 2)
06004       if(ubVolumeIndex >= 2)
06005       {
06006 //          INT8 bSlot;
06007 
06008             //bSlot = FindObj( pSoldier, EXTENDEDEAR );
06009             //if ( bSlot == HEAD1POS || bSlot == HEAD2POS)
06010             if ( FindHearingAid(pSoldier) )
06011                   BeginMultiPurposeLocator(sGridNo, bLevel, (INT8)((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )));
06012       }
06013 
06014       // flag soldier as having reported noise in a particular direction
06015 
06016 }
06017 
06018 void VerifyAndDecayOpplist(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
06019 {
06020       UINT32 uiLoop;
06021       INT8 *pPersOL;           // pointer into soldier's opponent list
06022       SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent;
06023 
06024       // reduce all seen/known opponent's turn counters by 1 (towards 0)
06025       // 1) verify accuracy of the opplist by testing sight vs known opponents
06026       // 2) increment opplist value if opponent is known but not currenly seen
06027       // 3) forget about known opponents who haven't been noticed in some time
06028 
06029       // if soldier is unconscious, make sure his opplist is wiped out & bail out
06030       if (pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE)
06031       {
06032             memset(pSoldier->bOppList,NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN,sizeof(pSoldier->bOppList));
06033             pSoldier->bOppCnt = 0;
06034             return;
06035       }
06036 
06037       // if any new opponents were seen earlier and not yet radioed
06038       if (pSoldier->bNewOppCnt)
06039       {
06040 #ifdef BETAVERSION
06041             sprintf(tempstr,"VerifyAndDecayOpplist: WARNING - %d(%s) still has %d NEW OPPONENTS - lastCaller %s/%s",
06042                   pSoldier->guynum,ExtMen[pSoldier->guynum].name,pSoldier->newOppCnt,
06043                   LastCallerText[ExtMen[pSoldier->guynum].lastCaller],
06044                   LastCaller2Text[ExtMen[pSoldier->guynum].lastCaller2]);
06045 
06046 #ifdef TESTVERSION      // make this ERROR/BETA again when it's fixed!
06047             PopMessage(tempstr);
06048 #endif
06049 
06050 #ifdef RECORDNET
06051             fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\n\t%s\n\n",tempstr);
06052 #endif
06053 
06054 #endif
06055 
06056             if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
06057             {
06058                   RadioSightings(pSoldier,EVERYBODY,pSoldier->bTeam);
06059             }
06060 
06061             pSoldier->bNewOppCnt = 0;
06062       }
06063 
06064       // man looks for each of his opponents WHO ARE ALREADY KNOWN TO HIM
06065       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
06066       {
06067             pOpponent = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
06068 
06069             // if this merc is active, here, and alive
06070             if (pOpponent != NULL && pOpponent->bLife)
06071             {
06072                   // if this merc is on the same team, he's no opponent, so skip him
06073                   if (pSoldier->bTeam == pOpponent->bTeam)
06074                   {
06075                         continue;
06076                   }
06077 
06078              pPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pOpponent->ubID;
06079       
06080      // if this opponent is "known" in any way (seen or heard recently)
06081      if (*pPersOL != NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN)
06082       {
06083        // use both sides actual x,y co-ordinates (neither side's moving)
06084        ManLooksForMan(pSoldier,pOpponent,VERIFYANDDECAYOPPLIST);
06085 
06086                    // decay opplist value if necessary
06087                    DECAY_OPPLIST_VALUE( *pPersOL );
06088                    /*
06089        // if opponent was SEEN recently but is NOT visible right now
06090        if (*pPersOL >= SEEN_THIS_TURN)
06091         {
06092          (*pPersOL)++;          // increment #turns it's been since last seen
06093 
06094          // if it's now been longer than the maximum we care to remember
06095          if (*pPersOL > SEEN_2_TURNS_AGO)
06096            *pPersOL = 0;        // forget that we knew this guy
06097         }
06098        else
06099         {
06100          // if opponent was merely HEARD recently, not actually seen
06101          if (*pPersOL <= HEARD_THIS_TURN)
06102           {
06103            (*pPersOL)--;        // increment #turns it's been since last heard
06104 
06105          // if it's now been longer than the maximum we care to remember
06106          if (*pPersOL < HEARD_2_TURNS_AGO)
06107            *pPersOL = 0;      // forget that we knew this guy
06108                     }
06109                         }
06110                   */
06111             }
06112 
06113     }
06114   }
06115 
06116 
06117  // if any new opponents were seen
06118  if (pSoldier->bNewOppCnt)
06119   {
06120    // turns out this is NOT an error!  If this guy was gassed last time he
06121    // looked, his sight limit was 2 tiles, and now he may no longer be gassed
06122    // and thus he sees opponents much further away for the first time!
06123    // - Always happens if you STUNGRENADE an opponent by surprise...
06124 #ifdef RECORDNET
06125    fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\tVerifyAndDecayOpplist: d(%s) saw %d new opponents\n",
06126                pSoldier->guynum,ExtMen[pSoldier->guynum].name,pSoldier->newOppCnt);
06127 #endif
06128 
06129    if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
06130      RadioSightings(pSoldier,EVERYBODY,pSoldier->bTeam);
06131 
06132    pSoldier->bNewOppCnt = 0;
06133   }
06134 }
06135 
06136 void DecayIndividualOpplist(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
06137 {
06138       UINT32 uiLoop;
06139       INT8 *pPersOL;           // pointer into soldier's opponent list
06140       SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent;
06141 
06142       // reduce all currently seen opponent's turn counters by 1 (towards 0)
06143 
06144       // if soldier is unconscious, make sure his opplist is wiped out & bail out
06145       if (pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE)
06146       {
06147             // must make sure that public opplist is kept to match...
06148             for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; uiLoop++ )
06149             {
06150                   if ( pSoldier->bOppList[ uiLoop ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
06151                   {
06152                         HandleManNoLongerSeen( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ uiLoop ], &(pSoldier->bOppList[ uiLoop ]), &(gbPublicOpplist[ pSoldier->bTeam ][ uiLoop ]) );
06153                   }
06154             }
06155       //void HandleManNoLongerSeen( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pOpponent, INT8 * pPersOL, INT8 * pbPublOL )
06156 
06157             memset(pSoldier->bOppList,NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN,sizeof(pSoldier->bOppList));
06158             pSoldier->bOppCnt = 0;
06159             return;
06160       }
06161 
06162       // man looks for each of his opponents WHO IS CURRENTLY SEEN
06163       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
06164       {
06165             pOpponent = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
06166 
06167             // if this merc is active, here, and alive
06168             if (pOpponent != NULL && pOpponent->bLife)
06169             {
06170                   // if this merc is on the same team, he's no opponent, so skip him
06171                   if (pSoldier->bTeam == pOpponent->bTeam)
06172                   {
06173                         continue;
06174                   }
06175 
06176              pPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pOpponent->ubID;
06177       
06178      // if this opponent is seen currently
06179      if (*pPersOL == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
06180       {
06181                         // they are NOT visible now!
06182                         (*pPersOL)++;
06183                         if (!CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pOpponent, pSoldier ) && !CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpponent ) && (pSoldier->bSide != pOpponent->bSide))
06184                         {
06185                               RemoveOneOpponent(pSoldier);
06186                         }
06187 
06188       }
06189     }
06190   }
06191 }

06194 
06195 void VerifyPublicOpplistDueToDeath(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
06196 {
06197       UINT32 uiLoop,uiTeamMateLoop;
06198       INT8 *pPersOL,*pMatePersOL;    // pointers into soldier's opponent list
06199       SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent,*pTeamMate;
06200       BOOLEAN bOpponentStillSeen;
06201 
06202 
06203       // OK, someone died. Anyone that the deceased ALONE saw has to decay
06204       // immediately in the Public Opplist.
06205 
06206 
06207   // If deceased didn't see ANYONE, don't bother
06208       if (pSoldier->bOppCnt == 0)
06209       {
06210             return;
06211       }
06212 
06213 
06214       // Deceased looks for each of his opponents who is "seen currently"
06215       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
06216       {
06217             // first, initialize flag since this will be a "new" opponent
06218             bOpponentStillSeen = FALSE;
06219             
06220             // grab a pointer to the "opponent"
06221             pOpponent = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
06222 
06223             // if this opponent is active, here, and alive
06224             if (pOpponent != NULL && pOpponent->bLife)
06225             {
06226                   // if this opponent is on the same team, he's no opponent, so skip him
06227                   if (pSoldier->bTeam == pOpponent->bTeam)
06228                   {
06229                         continue;
06230                   }
06231 
06232                   // point to what the deceased's personal opplist value is
06233                   pPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pOpponent->ubID;
06234       
06235                   // if this opponent was CURRENTLY SEEN by the deceased (before his
06236                   // untimely demise)
06237                   if (*pPersOL == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
06238                   {
06239                         // then we need to know if any teammates ALSO see this opponent, so loop through
06240                         // trying to find ONE witness to the death...
06241                         for (uiTeamMateLoop = 0; uiTeamMateLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiTeamMateLoop++)
06242                         {
06243                               // grab a pointer to the potential teammate
06244                               pTeamMate = MercSlots[ uiTeamMateLoop ];
06245 
06246                               // if this teammate is active, here, and alive
06247                               if (pTeamMate != NULL && pTeamMate->bLife)
06248                               {
06249                                     // if this opponent is NOT on the same team, then skip him
06250                                     if (pTeamMate->bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam)
06251                                     {
06252                                           continue;
06253                                     }
06254 
06255                                     // point to what the teammate's personal opplist value is
06256                                     pMatePersOL = pTeamMate->bOppList + pOpponent->ubID;
06257 
06258                                     // test to see if this value is "seen currently"
06259                                     if (*pMatePersOL == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
06260                                     {
06261                                           // this opponent HAS been verified! 
06262                                           bOpponentStillSeen = TRUE;
06263                                     
06264                                           // we can stop looking for other witnesses now
06265                                           break;
06266                                     }
06267                               }
06268                         }
06269                   }
06270 
06271                   // if no witnesses for this opponent, then decay the Public Opplist
06272                   if ( !bOpponentStillSeen )
06273                   {
06274                         DECAY_OPPLIST_VALUE( gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam][pOpponent->ubID] );
06275                   }
06276             }
06277       }
06278 }
06279 
06280 
06281 void DecayPublicOpplist(INT8 bTeam)
06282 {
06283       UINT32 uiLoop;
06284       INT8 bNoPubliclyKnownOpponents = TRUE;
06285       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
06286       INT8 *pbPublOL;
06287 
06288 
06289       //NumMessage("Decay for team #",team);
06290 
06291       // decay the team's public noise volume, forget public noise gridno if <= 0
06292       // used to be -1 per turn but that's not fast enough!
06293       if (gubPublicNoiseVolume[bTeam] > 0)
06294       {
06295             if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
06296             {                 
06297                   gubPublicNoiseVolume[bTeam] = (UINT8) ( (UINT32) (gubPublicNoiseVolume[bTeam] * 7) / 10 );
06298             }
06299             else
06300             {
06301                   gubPublicNoiseVolume[bTeam] = gubPublicNoiseVolume[bTeam] / 2;
06302             }
06303 
06304             if (gubPublicNoiseVolume[bTeam] <= 0)
06305             {
06306                   gsPublicNoiseGridno[bTeam] = NOWHERE;
06307             }
06308       }
06309 
06310       // decay the team's Public Opplist
06311       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
06312       {
06313             pSoldier = MercSlots[uiLoop];
06314 
06315             // for every active, living soldier on ANOTHER team
06316             if (pSoldier && pSoldier->bLife && (pSoldier->bTeam != bTeam))
06317             {
06318                   // hang a pointer to the byte holding team's public opplist for this merc
06319                   pbPublOL = &gbPublicOpplist[bTeam][pSoldier->ubID];
06320 
06321                   if (*pbPublOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN)
06322                   {
06323                         continue;
06324                   }
06325 
06326                   // well, that make this a "publicly known opponent", so nuke that flag
06327                   bNoPubliclyKnownOpponents = FALSE;
06328 
06329                   // if this person has been SEEN recently, but is not currently visible
06330                   if (*pbPublOL >= SEEN_THIS_TURN)
06331                   {
06332                         (*pbPublOL)++;      // increment how long it's been
06333                   }
06334                   else
06335                   {
06336                         // if this person has been only HEARD recently
06337                         if (*pbPublOL <= HEARD_THIS_TURN)
06338                         {
06339                               (*pbPublOL)--;    // increment how long it's been
06340                         }
06341                   }
06342 
06343                   // if it's been longer than the maximum we care to remember
06344                   if ((*pbPublOL > OLDEST_SEEN_VALUE) || (*pbPublOL < OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE))
06345                   {
06346 #ifdef RECORDOPPLIST
06347                         fprintf(OpplistFile,"UpdatePublic (DecayPublicOpplist) for team %d about %d\n",team,pSoldier->guynum);
06348 #endif
06349 
06350                         // forget about him,
06351                         // and also forget where he was last seen (it's been too long)
06352                         // this is mainly so POINT_PATROL guys don't SEEK_OPPONENTs forever
06353                         UpdatePublic(bTeam,pSoldier->ubID,NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN,NOWHERE,0);
06354                   }
06355             }
06356       }
06357 
06358       // if all opponents are publicly unknown (NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN)
06359       if (bNoPubliclyKnownOpponents)
06360       {
06361             // forget about the last radio alert (ie. throw away who made the call)
06362             // this is mainly so POINT_PATROL guys don't SEEK_FRIEND forever after
06363             gTacticalStatus.Team[bTeam].ubLastMercToRadio = NOBODY;
06364       }
06365 
06366       // decay watched locs as well
06367       DecayWatchedLocs( bTeam );
06368 }
06369 
06370 // bit of a misnomer; this is now decay all opplists
06371 void NonCombatDecayPublicOpplist( UINT32 uiTime )
06372 {
06373       UINT32      cnt;
06374 
06375       if ( uiTime - gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceLastOpplistDecay >= TIME_BETWEEN_RT_OPPLIST_DECAYS)
06376       {
06377             // decay!
06378             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
06379             {
06380                   if ( MercSlots[ cnt ] )
06381                   {
06382                         VerifyAndDecayOpplist( MercSlots[ cnt ] );
06383                   }
06384             }
06385 
06386 
06387             for( cnt = 0; cnt < MAXTEAMS; cnt++ )
06388             {
06389                   if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bMenInSector > 0 )
06390                   {
06391                         // decay team's public opplist
06392                         DecayPublicOpplist( (INT8)cnt );                
06393                   }     
06394             }
06395             // update time
06396             gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceLastOpplistDecay = uiTime;
06397       }
06398 }

06400 void RecalculateOppCntsDueToNoLongerNeutral( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06401 {
06402       UINT32                              uiLoop;
06403       SOLDIERTYPE *           pOpponent;
06404       
06405       pSoldier->bOppCnt = 0;
06406 
06407       if (!pSoldier->bNeutral)
06408       {
06409             for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
06410             {
06411                   pOpponent = MercSlots[uiLoop];
06412 
06413                   // for every active, living soldier on ANOTHER team
06414                   if (pOpponent && pOpponent->bLife && !pOpponent->bNeutral && (pOpponent->bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam) && (!CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pOpponent, pSoldier ) && !CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpponent ) && (pSoldier->bSide != pOpponent->bSide)) )
06415                   {
06416                         if ( pSoldier->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
06417                         {
06418                               AddOneOpponent( pSoldier );
06419                         }
06420                         if ( pOpponent->bOppList[pSoldier->ubID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
06421                         {
06422                               // have to add to opponent's oppcount as well since we just became non-neutral
06423                               AddOneOpponent( pOpponent );
06424                         }
06425                   }
06426             }
06427       }
06428 }

06430 void RecalculateOppCntsDueToBecomingNeutral( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06431 {
06432       UINT32                              uiLoop;
06433       SOLDIERTYPE *           pOpponent;
06434       
06435       if (pSoldier->bNeutral)
06436       {
06437             pSoldier->bOppCnt = 0;
06438 
06439             for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
06440             {
06441                   pOpponent = MercSlots[uiLoop];
06442 
06443                   // for every active, living soldier on ANOTHER team
06444                   if (pOpponent && pOpponent->bLife && !pOpponent->bNeutral && (pOpponent->bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam) && !CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpponent ) && (pSoldier->bSide != pOpponent->bSide) )
06445                   {
06446                         if ( pOpponent->bOppList[pSoldier->ubID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
06447                         {
06448                               // have to rem from opponent's oppcount as well since we just became neutral
06449                               RemoveOneOpponent( pOpponent );
06450                         }
06451                   }
06452             }
06453       }
06454 }
06455 
06456 void NoticeUnseenAttacker( SOLDIERTYPE * pAttacker, SOLDIERTYPE * pDefender, INT8 bReason )
06457 {
06458       INT8        bOldOppList;
06459       UINT8       ubTileSightLimit;
06460       BOOLEAN fSeesAttacker = FALSE;
06461       INT8        bDirection;
06462       BOOLEAN     fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
06463 
06464       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
06465       {
06466             return;
06467       }
06468 
06469       if ( pAttacker->usAttackingWeapon == DART_GUN )
06470       {
06471             // rarely noticed
06472             if ( SkillCheck( pDefender, NOTICE_DART_CHECK, 0 ) < 0)
06473             {
06474                   return;
06475             }
06476       }
06477 
06478       // do we need to do checks for life/breath here?
06479 
06480       if ( pDefender->ubBodyType == LARVAE_MONSTER || (pDefender->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE && pDefender->bTeam == OUR_TEAM) )
06481       {
06482             return;
06483       }
06484 
06485       bOldOppList = pDefender->bOppList[ pAttacker->ubID ];
06486       if ( PythSpacesAway( pAttacker->sGridNo, pDefender->sGridNo ) <= MaxDistanceVisible() )
06487       {
06488             // check LOS, considering we are now aware of the attacker
06489             // ignore muzzle flashes when must turning head 
06490             if ( pAttacker->fMuzzleFlash )
06491             {
06492                   bDirection = atan8( pDefender->sX,pDefender->sY, pAttacker->sX, pAttacker->sY );
06493                   if ( pDefender->bDirection != bDirection && pDefender->bDirection != gOneCDirection[ bDirection ] && pDefender->bDirection != gOneCCDirection[ bDirection ] )
06494                   {
06495                         // temporarily turn off muzzle flash so DistanceVisible can be calculated without it
06496                         pAttacker->fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
06497                         fMuzzleFlash = TRUE;
06498                   }
06499             }
06500 
06501         ubTileSightLimit = (UINT8) DistanceVisible( pDefender, (SoldierHasLimitedVision(pDefender) ? pDefender->bDesiredDirection : DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT), 0, pAttacker->sGridNo, pAttacker->bLevel, pAttacker );
06502             if (SoldierToSoldierLineOfSightTest( pDefender, pAttacker, ubTileSightLimit, TRUE ) != 0)
06503             {
06504                   fSeesAttacker = TRUE;
06505             }
06506             if ( fMuzzleFlash )
06507             {
06508                   pAttacker->fMuzzleFlash = TRUE;
06509             }
06510       }
06511 
06512       if (fSeesAttacker)
06513       {
06514             ManSeesMan( pDefender, pAttacker, pAttacker->sGridNo, pAttacker->bLevel, NOTICEUNSEENATTACKER, CALLER_UNKNOWN );
06515 
06516             // newOppCnt not needed here (no radioing), must get reset right away
06517             // CJC: Huh? well, leave it in for now
06518             pDefender->bNewOppCnt = 0;
06519 
06520 
06521             if (pDefender->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
06522             {
06523                   // EXPERIENCE GAIN (5): Victim notices/sees a previously UNSEEN attacker
06524                   StatChange( pDefender, EXPERAMT, 5, FALSE );
06525 
06526                   // mark attacker as being SEEN right now
06527                   RadioSightings( pDefender, pAttacker->ubID, pDefender->bTeam );
06528 
06529             }
06530             // NOTE: ENEMIES DON'T REPORT A SIGHTING PUBLICLY UNTIL THEY RADIO IT IN!
06531             else
06532             {
06533                   // go to threatening stance
06534                   ReevaluateEnemyStance( pDefender, pDefender->usAnimState );
06535             }
06536       }
06537       else  // victim NOTICED the attack, but CAN'T SEE the actual attacker
06538       {
06539             SetNewSituation( pDefender );          // re-evaluate situation
06540 
06541             // if victim's alert status is only GREEN or YELLOW
06542             if (pDefender->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED)
06543             {
06544                   // then this soldier goes to status RED, has proof of enemy presence
06545                   pDefender->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
06546                   CheckForChangingOrders( pDefender );
06547             }
06548 
06549             UpdatePersonal( pDefender, pAttacker->ubID, HEARD_THIS_TURN, pAttacker->sGridNo, pAttacker->bLevel );
06550 
06551             // if the victim is a human-controlled soldier, instantly report publicly
06552             if (pDefender->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
06553             {
06554                   // mark attacker as having been PUBLICLY heard THIS TURN & remember where
06555                   UpdatePublic( pDefender->bTeam, pAttacker->ubID, HEARD_THIS_TURN, pAttacker->sGridNo, pAttacker->bLevel );
06556             }
06557   }
06558 
06559       if ( StandardInterruptConditionsMet( pDefender, pAttacker->ubID, bOldOppList ) )
06560       {
06561             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("INTERRUPT: NoticeUnseenAttacker, standard conditions are met; defender %d, attacker %d", pDefender->ubID, pAttacker->ubID ) );
06562 
06563             // calculate the interrupt duel points
06564             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Calculating int duel pts for defender in NUA" );
06565             pDefender->bInterruptDuelPts = CalcInterruptDuelPts( pDefender, pAttacker->ubID, FALSE);
06566       }
06567       else
06568       {
06569             pDefender->bInterruptDuelPts = NO_INTERRUPT;
06570       }
06571 
06572       // say quote
06573 
06574       if (pDefender->bInterruptDuelPts != NO_INTERRUPT)
06575       {
06576             // check for possible interrupt and handle control change if it happens
06577             // this code is basically ResolveInterruptsVs for 1 man only...
06578 
06579             // calculate active soldier's dueling pts for the upcoming interrupt duel
06580             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Calculating int duel pts for attacker in NUA" );
06581             pAttacker->bInterruptDuelPts = CalcInterruptDuelPts( pAttacker, pDefender->ubID, FALSE );
06582             if ( InterruptDuel( pDefender, pAttacker ) )
06583             {
06584                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("INTERRUPT: NoticeUnseenAttacker, defender pts %d, attacker pts %d, defender gets interrupt", pDefender->bInterruptDuelPts, pAttacker->bInterruptDuelPts ) );
06585                   AddToIntList( pAttacker->ubID, FALSE, TRUE);
06586                   AddToIntList( pDefender->ubID, TRUE, TRUE);
06587                   DoneAddingToIntList( pDefender, TRUE, SIGHTINTERRUPT );
06588             }
06589             // either way, clear out both sides' duelPts fields to prepare next duel
06590             pDefender->bInterruptDuelPts = NO_INTERRUPT;
06591             #ifdef DEBUG_INTERRUPTS
06592                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Resetting int pts for %d in NUA", pDefender->ubID ) );
06593             #endif
06594             pAttacker->bInterruptDuelPts = NO_INTERRUPT;
06595             #ifdef DEBUG_INTERRUPTS
06596                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Resetting int pts for %d in NUA", pAttacker->ubID ) );
06597             #endif
06598 
06599       }     
06600 }

06602 void CheckForAlertWhenEnemyDies( SOLDIERTYPE * pDyingSoldier )
06603 {
06604       UINT8                               ubID;
06605       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
06606       INT8                                bDir;
06607       INT16                               sDistAway, sDistVisible;
06608 
06609       for ( ubID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pDyingSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID; ubID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pDyingSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; ubID++ )
06610       {
06611 
06612             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubID ];
06613 
06614             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && (pSoldier != pDyingSoldier) && (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE) && (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED ) )
06615             {
06616                   // this guy might have seen the man die
06617 
06618                   // distance we "see" then depends on the direction he is located from us
06619                   bDir = atan8(pSoldier->sX,pSoldier->sY,pDyingSoldier->sX,pDyingSoldier->sY);
06620                   sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, pSoldier->bDesiredDirection, bDir, pDyingSoldier->sGridNo, pDyingSoldier->bLevel, pDyingSoldier );
06621                   sDistAway = PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pDyingSoldier->sGridNo );
06622 
06623                   // if we see close enough to see the soldier
06624                   if (sDistAway <= sDistVisible)
06625                   {
06626                         // and we can trace a line of sight to his x,y coordinates
06627                         // assume enemies are always aware of their buddies...
06628                         if ( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, pDyingSoldier->sGridNo, pDyingSoldier->bLevel, 0, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
06629                         {
06630                               pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;      
06631                               CheckForChangingOrders( pSoldier );
06632                         }
06633                   }
06634             }
06635 
06636       }
06637 
06638 }

06680 INT8 FindUnusedWatchedLoc( UINT8 ubID )
06681 {

06683

06685       {
06686             if ( gsWatchedLoc[ ubID ][ bLoop ] == NOWHERE )
06687             {
06688                   return( bLoop );
06689             }
06690       }
06691       return( -1 );
06692 }

06695 {

06698       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_WATCHED_LOCS; bLoop++ )
06699       {
06700             if ( gsWatchedLoc[ ubID ][ bLoop ] != NOWHERE && gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bLoop ] <= ubPointLimit )
06701             {
06702                   return( bLoop );
06703             }
06704       }
06705       return( -1 );

06708 INT8 FindWatchedLoc( UINT8 ubID, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
06709 {
06710       INT8  bLoop;
06711 
06712       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_WATCHED_LOCS; bLoop++ )
06713       {
06714             if ( gsWatchedLoc[ ubID ][ bLoop ] != NOWHERE &&  gbWatchedLocLevel[ ubID ][ bLoop ] == bLevel )
06715             {
06716                   if ( SpacesAway( gsWatchedLoc[ ubID ][ bLoop ], sGridNo ) <= WATCHED_LOC_RADIUS )
06717                   {
06718                         return( bLoop );
06719                   }
06720             }
06721       }
06722       return( -1 );
06723 }

06725 INT8 GetWatchedLocPoints( UINT8 ubID, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
06726 {
06727       INT8  bLoc;
06728 
06729       bLoc = FindWatchedLoc( ubID, sGridNo, bLevel );
06730       if (bLoc != -1)
06731       {
06732             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
06733                   /*
06734                   if (gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bLoc ] > 1)
06735                   {
06736                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Soldier %d getting %d points for interrupt in watched location", ubID, gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bLoc ] - 1 );
06737                   }
06738                   */
06739             #endif
06740             // one loc point is worth nothing, so return number minus 1
06741 
06742             // experiment with 1 loc point being worth 1 point
06743             return( gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bLoc ] );
06744       }
06745 
06746       return( 0 );
06747 }
