06750 INT8 GetHighestVisibleWatchedLoc( UINT8 ubID )
06751 {
06752       INT8  bLoop;
06753       INT8  bHighestLoc = -1;
06754       INT8  bHighestPoints = 0;
06755       INT16 sDistVisible;
06756 
06757       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_WATCHED_LOCS; bLoop++ )
06758       {
06759             if ( gsWatchedLoc[ ubID ][ bLoop ] != NOWHERE && gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bLoop ] > bHighestPoints )
06760             {
06761             sDistVisible =  DistanceVisible( MercPtrs[ ubID ], (SoldierHasLimitedVision(MercPtrs[ ubID ]) ? MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bDesiredDirection : DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT), DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, gsWatchedLoc[ ubID ][ bLoop ], gbWatchedLocLevel[ ubID ][ bLoop ], MercPtrs[ubID] );
06762                   // look at standing height
06763                   if ( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( MercPtrs[ ubID ], gsWatchedLoc[ ubID ][ bLoop ], gbWatchedLocLevel[ ubID ][ bLoop ], 3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
06764                   {
06765                         bHighestLoc = bLoop;
06766                         bHighestPoints = gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bLoop ];
06767                   }
06768             }
06769       }
06770       return( bHighestLoc );
06771 }

06779       {

06781             {
06782                   bHighestPoints = gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bLoop ];
06783             }

06788 
06789 void CommunicateWatchedLoc( UINT8 ubID, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubPoints )
06790 {
06791       UINT8       ubLoop;
06792       INT8        bTeam, bLoopPoint, bPoint;
06793 
06794       bTeam = MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bTeam;
06795 
06796       for ( ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bFirstID; ubLoop < gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bLastID; ubLoop++ )
06797       {
06798             if ( ubLoop == ubID || MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]->bActive == FALSE || MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]->bInSector == FALSE || MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]->bLife < OKLIFE )
06799             {
06800                   continue;
06801             }
06802             bLoopPoint = FindWatchedLoc( ubLoop, sGridNo, bLevel );     
06803             if ( bLoopPoint == -1 )
06804             {
06805                   // add this as a watched point
06806                   bPoint = FindUnusedWatchedLoc( ubLoop );
06807                   if (bPoint == -1)
06808                   {
06809                         // if we have a point with only 1 point left, replace it
06810                         bPoint = FindWatchedLocWithLessThanXPointsLeft( ubLoop, ubPoints );
06811                   }
06812                   if (bPoint != -1)
06813                   {
06814                         gsWatchedLoc[ ubLoop ][ bPoint ] = sGridNo;
06815                         gbWatchedLocLevel[ ubLoop ][ bPoint ] = bLevel;
06816                         gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubLoop ][ bPoint ] = ubPoints;
06817                         gfWatchedLocReset[ ubLoop ][ bPoint ] = FALSE;
06818                         gfWatchedLocHasBeenIncremented[ ubLoop ][ bPoint ] = TRUE;
06819                   }
06820                   // else no points available!
06821             }
06822             else
06823             {
06824                   // increment to max
06825                   gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubLoop ][ bLoopPoint ] = __max( gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubLoop ][ bLoopPoint ], ubPoints );
06826 
06827                   gfWatchedLocReset[ ubLoop ][ bLoopPoint ] = FALSE;
06828                   gfWatchedLocHasBeenIncremented[ ubLoop ][ bLoopPoint ] = TRUE;
06829             }
06830       }
06831 }
06832 
06833 
06834 void IncrementWatchedLoc( UINT8 ubID, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
06835 {
06836       INT8  bPoint;
06837 
06838       bPoint = FindWatchedLoc( ubID, sGridNo, bLevel );
06839       if (bPoint == -1)
06840       {
06841             // try adding point
06842             bPoint = FindUnusedWatchedLoc( ubID );
06843             if (bPoint == -1)
06844             {
06845                   // if we have a point with only 1 point left, replace it
06846                   bPoint = FindWatchedLocWithLessThanXPointsLeft( ubID, 1 );        
06847             }
06848             
06849             if (bPoint != -1)
06850             {
06851                   gsWatchedLoc[ ubID ][ bPoint ] = sGridNo;
06852                   gbWatchedLocLevel[ ubID ][ bPoint ] = bLevel;
06853                   gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bPoint ] = 1;
06854                   gfWatchedLocReset[ ubID ][ bPoint ] = FALSE;
06855                   gfWatchedLocHasBeenIncremented[ ubID ][ bPoint ] = TRUE;
06856                   
06857                   CommunicateWatchedLoc( ubID, sGridNo, bLevel, 1 );
06858             }
06859             // otherwise abort; no points available
06860       }
06861       else
06862       {           
06863             if ( !gfWatchedLocHasBeenIncremented[ ubID ][ bPoint ] && gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bPoint ] < MAX_WATCHED_LOC_POINTS )
06864             {
06865                   gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bPoint ]++;
06866                   CommunicateWatchedLoc( ubID, sGridNo, bLevel, gubWatchedLocPoints[ ubID ][ bPoint ] );
06867             }
06868             gfWatchedLocReset[ ubID ][ bPoint ] = FALSE;
06869             gfWatchedLocHasBeenIncremented[ ubID ][ bPoint ] = TRUE;
06870       }
06871 }

06873 void SetWatchedLocAsUsed( UINT8 ubID, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
06874 {
06875       INT8  bPoint;
06876 
06877       bPoint = FindWatchedLoc( ubID, sGridNo, bLevel );
06878       if (bPoint != -1)
06879       {
06880             gfWatchedLocReset[ ubID ][ bPoint ] = FALSE;
06881       }
06882 }

06884 BOOLEAN WatchedLocLocationIsEmpty( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, INT8 bTeam )
06885 {
06886       // look to see if there is anyone near the watched loc who is not on this team
06887       UINT8 ubID;
06888       INT16 sTempGridNo, sX, sY;
06889 
06890       for ( sY = -WATCHED_LOC_RADIUS; sY <= WATCHED_LOC_RADIUS; sY++ )
06891       {
06892             for ( sX = -WATCHED_LOC_RADIUS; sX <= WATCHED_LOC_RADIUS; sX++ )
06893             {
06894                   sTempGridNo = sGridNo + sX + sY * WORLD_ROWS;
06895                   if ( sTempGridNo < 0 || sTempGridNo >= WORLD_MAX )
06896                   {
06897                         continue;
06898                   }
06899                   ubID = WhoIsThere2( sTempGridNo, bLevel );
06900                   if ( ubID != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bTeam != bTeam )
06901                   {
06902                         return( FALSE );
06903                   }
06904             }
06905       }
06906       return( TRUE );
06907 }
06908 
06909 void DecayWatchedLocs( INT8 bTeam )
06910 {
06911       UINT8 cnt, cnt2;
06912 
06913       // loop through all soldiers
06914       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bFirstID; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++ )
06915       {
06916             // for each watched location
06917             for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < NUM_WATCHED_LOCS; cnt2++ )
06918             {
06919                   if ( gsWatchedLoc[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] != NOWHERE && WatchedLocLocationIsEmpty( gsWatchedLoc[ cnt ][ cnt2 ], gbWatchedLocLevel[ cnt ][ cnt2 ], bTeam ) )
06920                   {
06921                         // if the reset flag is still set, then we should decay this point
06922                         if (gfWatchedLocReset[ cnt ][ cnt2 ])
06923                         {
06924                               // turn flag off again              
06925                               gfWatchedLocReset[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] = FALSE;
06926 
06927                               // halve points
06928                               gubWatchedLocPoints[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] /= 2;
06929                               // if points have reached 0, then reset the location
06930                               if (gubWatchedLocPoints[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] == 0)
06931                               {
06932                                     gsWatchedLoc[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] = NOWHERE;
06933                               }
06934                         }
06935                         else
06936                         {
06937                               // flag was false so set to true (will be reset if new people seen there next turn)
06938                               gfWatchedLocReset[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] = TRUE;
06939                         }
06940                   }
06941             }
06942       }
06943 }
